建模和可视化
用于建模和可视化的集成用户环境。
Altair
ConnectMe
ConnectMe为客户提供了另一种启动方式
已安装HyperWorks和APA产品，通知用户最新产品
更新，并允许直接访问最新的Altair
消息

注意：ConnectMe包含在HyperWorks Desktop和HyperWorks Solvers软件包中，用于安装
HyperWorks套件。

有关详细信息，请参阅ConnectMe帮助
手册

Altair
前处理
HyperMesh是一款高性能的有限元预处理和
主要有限元求解器的后处理器，允许工程师进行分析
在高度互动和视觉环境中的设计条件。HyperMesh的用户界面易于学习，并支持
直接使用CAD几何图形和现有的有限元模型，提供稳健的
互操作性和效率。HyperMesh中的高级自动化工具允许用户从一组
质量标准，通过变形更改现有网格，并生成中间曲面
来自不同厚度的模型。
好处


通过以下方式减少时间和工程分析成本
高性能有限元建模和
后处理
通过直观的
用户界面和一流的功能
通过直接
CAD几何图形和现有有限元模型的使用
通过简化复杂几何图形的建模过程
高速、高质量的自动啮合
通过提供直接的
广泛的分析代码接口，确保最佳
代码可用于特定情况
经济高效的定价可为您的
软件投资
特定于解算器的用户首选项




有关详细信息，请参阅HyperMesh帮助
手册

Altair
HyperView
HyperView是一个完整的后处理和可视化
用于有限元分析（FEA）、多体系统仿真、视频、，
和工程数据。速度惊人的3D图形和无与伦比的功能集
CAE结果后处理的速度和集成的新标准。
HyperView使您能够可视化数据
交互式地，以及捕获和标准化您的后处理活动
使用过程自动化功能。HyperView还保存
3D动画导致Altair的紧凑H3D格式，因此
您可以使用Altair在三维网络环境中可视化和共享CAE结果
HyperView播放器。
好处


减少与工程分析相关的时间和成本
通过高性能直观的图形界面
通过业界领先的3D性能提高生产效率
图样
读取CAE原生数据文件：Altair
OptiStruct，Altair
Radioss，Altair
MotionSolve、HyperForm、LS-DYNA、Permas、MADYMO、Marc、，
PAM-CRASH、Nastran、Abaqus、ADAMS、ANSYS、I-deas
许多CAE解算器的直接阅读器，以及Altair H3D压缩二进制格式
牛郎星的XY绘图能力
HyperGraph
自定义界面和专用工具，适合您的工程
环境
通过获得新见解
有限元分析和多体的同步结果可视化
动画、XY打印和视频数据
多个CAE模型叠加在一个窗口中
可视化动画类型，如自适应网格和
具有柔性体的多体动力学模型


链接到HyperView Player for web
沟通与协作
价值定价，通过Altair
HyperWorks单元系统，以提供
为您的软件投资提供最大的功能




有关详细信息，请参阅HyperView帮助
手册


Altair
HyperGraph 2D/Altair
HyperGraph 3D
HyperGraph是一个强大的数据分析和绘图工具
具有许多流行文件格式的接口。其复杂的数学引擎是
甚至能够处理最复杂的数学表达式。不同的
基于时域和频域的真实数据和复杂数据的绘制方法有
可通过笛卡尔、极坐标和三维瀑布图获得。
使用最先进的技术，鼠标即可轻松访问功能
打印浏览器、用户定义菜单和标准Windows用户界面。任何
分析会议，包括与其他Altair集成的会议
HyperWorks应用程序，可以作为自动化运行
一次又一次地处理以处理新的数据集。HyperGraph将这些功能与高质量相结合
创建完整数据的演示输出和自定义功能
任何组织的分析系统。
好处
HyperGraph提供设计、测试和
分析工程师提供直观的绘图和数据分析包。
HyperGraph的组合
易于使用的界面和强大的自动化工具套件使
工程师可以更有效地查看和分析数据，包括：
最小化生成绘图所需的时间-可自定义
自动绘图生成器生成一系列完全标记的绘图
在用户定义的布局中，使用文件头和从数据文件
频道信息。
消除重复任务-绘图宏捕获并自动化
常见的数学表达式。
消除了重复的绘图生成-报告模板可以
捕获并自动构建整页数据
情节。
提供完全可自定义的界面-自定义
界面和工具，以适应任何工程环境。
允许用户将数学函数添加到Altair强大的数学中
图书馆
读取CAE原生数据文件：Altair
OptiStruct，Altair
Radioss，Altair
MotionSolve、HyperForm、LS-DYNA、NHTSA ABF、MADYMO、PAM-CRASH、Nastran、Abaqus、ADAMS、DADS和SIMPACK
包含各种X-Y和3D数据格式的读取器，以及
可以通过数学生成曲线和三维曲面图
使用大量数学库的表达式。
启用与完全集成的三维打印环境
HyperWorks用于管理，
查看和分析3D绘图，
以及3D线数据。
提供用于构建和分析瀑布数据的功能
包括订单计算、可视化和打印订单
在XY图中。瀑布图支持幅度与
频率或阶数与时间或大小的关系。
允许有条件格式化的摘要表支持
链接到曲线的数学表达式。
包括200多个内置数学函数，专注于CAE
包括数据过滤器和10个受制裁的伤害
计算。
通过缩放、DFT或对响应重新采样来计算阶数
数据
提供用于查询三维打印的丰富工具集。平面和
可以通过三维数据传递曲面截面以生成
剖面切割图。其他查询工具与一样易于使用
单击数据以查看X、Y、Z值。放大数据
保留轴值的显示。
发布到PowerPoint：在之间建立连接
HyperGraph和PowerPoint允许
要发布HyperGraph的用户
会话到PowerPoint演示文稿，并在以后更新这些演示文稿
新结果加载到HyperGraph中。PowerPoint中所做的更改将被保留。
导出HTML会话：启用
用户编写HTML报告
直接转换为HTML格式。
在报告和
演示。
提供自动化数据分析和报告生成的工具-
过程自动化工具使用户能够覆盖顺序测试
以及用于可视化和分析的仿真结果。
位于由Tcl命令层驱动的开放式体系结构上。附加数学
函数、文件读取器、对话框、下拉菜单，以及
可以很容易地添加右键菜单。




有关详细信息，请参阅HyperGraph帮助
手册

Altair
MotionView
MotionView是一款通用的前置和后置处理器
和用于机械系统仿真的可视化工具，包括业界领先的
装配管理、数据管理和柔体建模的能力。它
提供了通过重用创建任意深度的分层模型的能力
系统定义，包括利用其本地参数数据功能。
MotionView提供了高效且易于使用的
界面包括大量建模实用程序，以最大限度地提高用户的
生产率此外，通过使用其Tcl
自动化层，MotionView允许用户创建和
重用脚本和自定义用户界面。MotionView是
集成在一个单一的环境中，也包括最先进的技术
后处理、DOE和优化以及数学处理能力。
好处


减少与工程分析相关的时间和成本
通过高性能直观的图形界面
多体动力学建模和后处理。
允许轻松地重复使用系统定义和程序集
允许一个模型用作另一个模型中的子系统
模型
通过提供内置的数据管理功能
Altair
HyperWorks协作工具，
包括文件版本控制、历史记录、签入和签出。
通过“CAD导入”轻松捕获基于CAD的信息，
允许简化零件图形的读取，惯性
值和自由点。
实现基于以下内容生成柔体的自动化过程
FE输入甲板。
通过上下文菜单实现高效直观的用户流
驱动接口。
使用构建和分析悬架和车辆模型
标准车辆库。
自动将MBD加载结果重新格式化到Altair
Radioss和Nastran解算器格式。
导出到各种解算器，如Altair
MotionSolve、ADAMS、Abaqus
或者创建自己的求解器编写器。
使用Templex和Tcl自定义MBD建模和解决方案环境。




有关详细信息，请参考MotionView帮助
手册。

Altair
文本框
TextView提供了强大的数学脚本处理
加上一个文本编辑器。它是Altair的集成应用程序
HyperWorks桌面。TextView的数学
脚本可以引用Altair的矢量数据
HyperGraph 2D/HyperGraph 3D
用于自动化数据处理和数据摘要的窗口。
有关详细信息，请参阅TextView帮助
手册

Altair
媒体视图
MediaView播放和显示视频文件和静态文件
图像。视频文件的播放与Altair同步
HyperView模型动画加上Altair
用于数据比较和分析的HyperGraph图。视频
回放可以是自动的或手动控制的。在手动播放过程中，视频可以
通过单击XY曲线位置来控制以查看中的相应帧
视频。
有关更多信息，请参阅MediaView帮助
手册

Altair
HyperView播放器
HyperView Player使您的组织能够可视化
三维CAE模型和结果通过互联网。它为提供了一个协作解决方案
在整个设计过程中实现企业范围的产品数据可视化。HyperView Player包括一个web浏览器插件以及
适用于Windows PC、Mac OS和Linux的独立可执行文件。
HyperView Player使CAE工程师能够进行通信
与多个专业的工程师有效分析结果，提高
开发过程中的产品设计。HyperView Player使用Altair紧凑型H3D格式的产品数据，可以轻松共享产品信息
分析师、测试工程师、工具制造商、产品设计工程师和产品
管理人员。
HyperView Player还允许专业销售人员，
营销、财务、出版、工程和支持
信息丰富的3D多媒体演示、文档、提案、项目报告，
和网页。
有关详细信息，请参阅HyperView Player帮助
手册

Altair
HyperWorks协作工具
HyperWorks协作工具（HWCT）是一组为用户提供的功能
具有组织和管理其所有模拟数据和文件的能力。
Altair开箱即用
HyperWorks Desktop和Altair
HyperMesh，HWCT是个人用户的理想选择
个人数据的组织和管理，以及希望
在整个模拟生命周期中进行协作。
标准HWCT功能包括：
勘探


浏览对话框，集成到所有本地硬件文件对话框中
允许轻松搜索和检索文件。
模拟文件元数据的自动提取和索引
用于简单搜索和复杂搜索。
查看文件属性


组织


将仿真数据和文件组织到库中。
浏览个人和团队库以查找和检索
目录
通过完整的版本控制和生命周期保留血统
操作。


连接


无缝访问存储在中的零件、CAD和BOM表
企业PDM系统。
直接下载并导入到HyperWorks中。
发布模拟数据（例如网格、解算器组、结果）
返回PDM。


好处


组织进行中工作的模拟数据和文件
全面的搜索功能
访问最新的最新CAD和CAE数据
CAD/PDM与CAE/仿真的可追溯性




有关更多信息，请参阅HyperWorks协作工具帮助手册。

Altair
HyperStudy
HyperStudy是一个多学科的设计探索，
研究和优化软件。使用HyperStudy，用户
可以深入了解其应用程序，做出更好的设计决策并进行优化
其系统的性能、可靠性和稳健性。
将该工具设计为向导，使其易于学习和使用。其无缝
与Altair的集成
HyperWorks支持直接的模型参数化
包括形状参数化和的输出文件的直接结果读取
求解器，如Altair
Radioss，Altair
MotionSolve，Altair
AcuSolve、Abaqus、ADAMS、ANSYS、LS-DYNA和Nastran。对于其他
求解器，将求解器输入数据定义为设计变量，并提取
求解器输出数据作为响应也可以很容易地完成。对于复杂数学，
Altair
Compose、Python或Templex也可用。
HyperStudy后处理模块包含显示器，
分析和数据挖掘功能，帮助工程师克服
从多次研究中提取相关信息是一项具有挑战性的任务。有了它
一套独特而强大的工具，可以对模拟结果进行分析、排序和
在HyperStudy中有效学习。
好处
用户可以：
研究设计变更对设计性能的影响
有效地
评估设计的稳健性并获得必要的指导
以实现稳健的设计
针对不同的
设计的属性
进行系统识别和相关性研究
通过方法识别设计，最大限度地缩短上市时间
难题的方向
在HyperStudy UI或Excel电子表格中执行快速权衡研究
使用HyperStudy的Fit权衡
Excel插件




有关更多信息，请参阅HyperStudy帮助
手册

Altair
HyperLife
HyperLife是一款易于学习的疲劳分析软件
在求解器中性框架上开发。它为
耐久性分析，直接与所有主要的有限元分析对接
（FEA）结果文件。借助嵌入式材料库，HyperLife为以下条件下的疲劳寿命预测提供解决方案
广泛的工业应用中的静态和瞬态负载。
好处


易于学习和使用的图形界面
疲劳寿命预测。
解算器中性框架接口领先的有限元分析结果
数据
嵌入式材料数据库。
对执行同时疲劳分析的专业模块
基底材料和焊接接头符合多种设计
规范和指南*
可自定义环境以添加新的或内部使用
功能*




*Altair中的Beta版本
HyperWorks
2021发布。
有关更多信息，请参阅HyperLife帮助
手册

Altair
HyperCrash
HyperCrash是为支持
Altair
Radioss、LS-DYNA和PAM-CRASH。HyperWorks提供了
研究乘员模拟和其他要求的综合环境
碰撞安全领域。
特征


LS-DYNA和Radioss的广泛预处理功能。
Radioss的持续支持（最多
2017）和大多数关键词。
强大的工具，可轻松地将输入甲板从LS-DYNA转换为Radioss，只需最少的用户干预。
支持PAM-CRASH 2G以及
从PAM-CRASH转换为
无线电。
用于碰撞安全应用的广泛工具：模型构建，
特性和材质创建、连接定义、质量
检查等等。
全套焊接技术，如胶水、螺栓和点焊
焊缝。
用于映射金属成形结果的结果映射器模块。
关键安全模块：假人定位、座椅变形、安全带
发电机和安全气囊折叠。
LS-DYNA和的扩展库
先进的无辐射假人
定位和安全带布线工具。


好处


使用直观的预处理器提高用户效率
界面
最小化LS-DYNA和
具有可靠模型的无辐射性
检查输入面板。
便于检查和移除贯穿件
十字路口。
提供大量定制面板，帮助用户创建和更新
设置LS-DYNA所需的许多卡
和Radioss模型。




有关更多信息，请参阅HyperCrash帮助
手册

Altair
虚拟风洞
虚拟风洞（VWT）是一种垂直解决方案
对车辆、建筑物、自行车或其他车辆进行外部空气动力学研究
对象。由Altair的提供动力
计算流体动力学（CFD）求解器Altair
AcuSolve和Altair
ultraFluidX，瞬态和稳态研究可以
准确且在短时间内执行。直观的用户界面
简化了定义网格参数以及CFD案例的过程
设置。物理对象（如旋转的轮子或散热器）的定义，
包括智能自动化，以将用户交互减少到最小。
虚拟风洞具有快速而坚固的
体积网格器和自动生成报告。
有关更多信息，请参考虚拟风洞
帮助手册。

Altair
SimLab
SimLab是一个面向过程的多学科仿真
环境，以准确分析复杂部件的性能。倍数
物理，包括结构、热和流体动力学，可以很容易地设置使用
高度自动化的建模任务，有助于大幅减少所花费的时间
创建有限元模型并解释结果。而不是乏味的几何
清除，工作直接在几何图形上执行–通过导入和更新
双向CAD耦合-通过定义各个区域的网格规范。
好处


直观易懂的图形用户界面覆盖
建模过程的各个方面
自动化网格生成，无需繁琐的CAD
几何形状清除
用模板驱动的方法进行繁琐的建模
任务
使用创建可共享和可重复的模拟工作流
自动特征和零件识别
通过实时同步到流行的快速设计探索
参数化CAD系统




有关更多信息，请参阅SimLab帮助
手册

Altair
SimSolid
SimSolid是一个模拟软件应用程序
对结构系统进行静力学、动力学和热学分析
传统有限元分析的替代方案。SimSolid使用功能齐全、不简化的实心几何体
模型进行分析，并且不使用网格。
好处


直观的界面遵循典型的用户工作流程。
无需简化几何图形和网格，从而
提高了准确性并减少了劳动。
为计算时间和
内存占用空间，允许大/复杂的几何图形
快速解决。




有关更多信息，请参阅SimSolid帮助
手册

doc_content:
Solvers
Suite of finite element and multibody dynamics solvers for design and
        optimization.
Altair
OptiStruct
OptiStruct is a state-of-the-art finite element solver
                for linear and nonlinear structural problems. It employs implicit integration
                schemes for static and dynamic problems. Besides mechanical loading, heat transfer
                coupled with structures is also available.
OptiStruct is designed with optimization at the core. The
                majority of solution sequences are available for optimization. A wide range of
                design problems can be solved addressing concept design and design fine tuning. In
                addition, Altair
Radioss and Altair
MotionSolve have been integrated to address
                multi-disciplinary optimization involving crash and impact, and multibody systems,
                respectively. The optimization capabilities of OptiStruct are innovative and market-leading.
Analysis applications of OptiStruct include Automotive
                powertrain durability and vibrations, vehicle interior acoustics, vibrations of
                satellites, durability of heavy-duty and off-road vehicles, component stress and
                vibrations analysis, detailed finite element analysis of airplane structures, random
                vibrations of ships and buildings, structural behavior of composite wings, buckling
                behavior, and many other advanced engineering applications.
Optimization applications of OptiStruct include material
                layout of structures and parts under static loads, sheet metal sizing under static
                and dynamic loads, improvement of acoustic behavior, design of parts for additive
                manufacturing, design of composite layups, and more.
Structural Analysis 
Linear Static Analysis
Linear Buckling Analysis
Small Displacement Nonlinear Analysis
Large Displacement Nonlinear Static Analysis
Normal Modes Analysis
Frequency Response Analysis
Complex Eigenvalue Analysis
Brake Squeal Analysis
Random Response Analysis
Response Spectrum Analysis
Linear Transient Response Analysis
Nonlinear Transient Response Analysis
Explicit Nonlinear Dynamic Analysis (Radioss Integration) 


Thermal Analysis 
Linear Steady-State Heat Transfer Analysis
Linear Transient Heat Transfer Analysis
Nonlinear Steady-State Heat Transfer Analysis
Contact-based Thermal Analysis
One Step Transient Thermal Stress Analysis


Acoustic Analysis 
Coupled Frequency Response Analysis of Fluid-Structure Models
Radiated Sound Analysis


Fatigue Analysis 
Stress-Life method
Strain-Life method
Dang Van Criterion (Factor of Safety)
Random Response Fatigue Analysis


Rotor Dynamics
Fast equation solver 
Sparse matrix solver
Iterative PCG solver
Lanczos eigensolver
SMP parallelization
DMIG input
AMLS interface
FastFRS method
FastFRS interface


Advanced element formulations 
Triangular, quadrilateral, first and second order shells
Laminated shells
Hexahedron, pyramid, tetrahedron first and second order solids
Bar, beam, bushing, and rod elements
Spring, mass, and damping scalar elements
Mesh independent gap and weld elements
Rigid elements
Concentrated and non-structural mass
Direct matrix input


Geometric element quality check
Local coordinate systems
Multi-point constraints
Contact, tie interfaces
Prestressed analysis
Linear-elastic materials 
Isotropic
Anisotropic
Orthotropic


Nonlinear materials 
Elastoplastic
Hyperelastic
Viscoelastic


Material consistency checks
Ground check for unintentionally constrained rigid body modes.


OptiStruct Modeling Techniques include:
Parts and Instances
Subcase Specific Modeling
Direct Matrix Input (Superelements) 
Direct Matrix Input
Creating Superelements
Component Dynamic Analysis


Flexible Body Generation
Poroelastic Materials


A typical set of finite elements including shell, solid, bar, scalar, and rigid
                elements as well as loads and materials are available for modeling complex
                events.
Multibody dynamics solutions integrated via OptiStruct
                for rigid and flexible bodies include:
Kinematics
Dynamics
Static
Quasi-static
Linearization


All typical types of constraints like joints, gears, couplers, user-defined
                constraints, and high-pair joints can be defined. High pair joints include
                point-to-curve, point-to-surface, curve-to-curve, curve-to-surface, and
                surface-to-surface constraints. They can connect rigid bodies, flexible bodies, or
                rigid and flexible bodies. For this multibody dynamics solution, the power of Altair
                MotionSolve has been integrated with OptiStruct.


Structural Design and Optimization
Structural design tools include topology, topography, and free-size
                            optimization. Sizing, shape and free shape optimization are available
                            for structural optimization. 
In the formulation of design and optimization problems, the following
                            responses can be applied as the objective or as constraints: compliance,
                            frequency, volume, mass, moment of inertia, center of gravity,
                            displacement, velocity, acceleration, buckling factor, stress, strain,
                            composite failure, force, synthetic response, and external (user-
                            defined) functions. Static, inertia relief, nonlinear quasi-static
                            (contact), normal modes, buckling, and frequency response solutions can
                            be included in a multi-disciplinary optimization setup. 
Topology, topography, size, and shape optimization can be combined in a
                            general problem formulation. 
Reliability-based Design Optimization is available to provide optimum
                            designs in the presence of uncertainty.
Topology Optimization
Topology optimization generates an optimized material distribution for a
                            set of loads and constraints within a given design space. The design
                            space can be defined using shell or solid elements, or both. The
                            classical topology optimization set up solving the minimum compliance
                            problem, as well as the dual formulation with multiple constraints are
                            available. Constraints on von Mises stress and buckling factor are
                            available with limitations. Manufacturing constraints can be imposed
                            using a minimum member size constraint, draw direction constraints,
                            extrusion constraints, symmetry planes, pattern grouping, and pattern
                            repetition. 
Free-size optimization is available for shell design spaces. The shell
                            thickness or composite ply-thickness of each element is the design
                            variable. 
Failsafe Topology Optimization is available to account for design
                            feasibility in situations where a section of the structure fails. 
Lattice Structure Optimization, a novel solution, to create blended
                            Solid and Lattice structures from concept to detailed final design is
                            available. This technology is developed in particular to assist design
                            innovation for additive layer manufacturing (3D printing).
Topography Optimization
For thin-walled structures, beads or swages are often used as
                            reinforcement features. For a given set of bead dimensions, OptiStruct's topography optimization technology
                            will generate innovative design proposals with the optimal bead pattern
                            and location for reinforcement to meet certain performance requirements.
                            Typical applications include panel stiffening and managing
                            frequencies.
Size and Shape Optimization
General size and shape optimization problems can be solved. Variables
                            can be assigned to perturbation vectors, which control the shape of the
                            model. Variables can also be assigned to properties, which control the
                            thickness, area, moments of inertia, stiffness, and non-structural mass
                            of elements in the model. All of the variables supported by OptiStruct can be assigned using Altair
HyperMesh. Shape perturbation vectors can be
                            created using HyperMorph. 
The reduction of local stress can be accomplished easily using free
                            shape optimization. Shape perturbations are automatically determined by
                                OptiStruct (based on the stress levels
                            in the design) when using this technique.
The layout of laminated shells can be improved by modifying the ply
                            thickness and ply angle of these materials.
Multibody Dynamics Analysis
Different solution sequences for the analysis of mechanical systems are
                            available; these include Kinematics, Dynamics, Static, and Quasi-static
                            solutions. Flexible bodies can be derived from any finite element model
                            defined in OptiStruct.


For more information, reference the OptiStruct help
                manual.

Altair
Radioss
Radioss is a leading structural analysis solver for
                highly nonlinear problems under dynamic loadings. It is highly differentiated for
                Scalability, Quality and Robustness, and consists of features for multi-physics
                simulation and advanced materials such as composites. Radioss is used across all industries worldwide to improve
                the crashworthiness, safety, and manufacturability of structural designs. For over
                25 years, Radioss has established itself as a leader and
                an Industry standard for automotive crash and impact analysis.
Finite element solutions via Altair Radioss include:
Explicit dynamic analysis
Linear and nonlinear implicit static analysis
Transient heat transfer and thermo-mechanical coupling
Explicit Arbitrary Euler-Lagrangian (ALE) formulation
Explicit Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
Smooth Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH)
Incremental sheet metal stamping analysis with mesh adaptivity
Normal modes analysis 
Linear and nonlinear buckling analysis


For more information, reference the Radioss help
                manual.

Altair
MotionSolve
MotionSolve is a state-of-the-art multibody dynamics
                solver that is included in the Altair
HyperWorks package. MotionSolve enables you to create realistic, physics-based
                simulations of sophisticated mechanical systems and includes a wide array of
                customization capabilities. MotionSolve has been
                successfully used to model and simulate a broad range of systems including
                automobile suspensions, aircraft landing gears, biomedical devices, and satellite
                launch systems. With a variety of integrators, support of for co-simulation,
                multiphysics and a special focus on flexible body modeling, MotionSolve is setup to cover the range of simulation needs
                for MBS, some of which include linear and vibration studies, stress and durability
                evaluation, load extraction from the multibody system, effort estimation for the
                multibody system, packaging studies and simulating models that encompass more than
                one kind of physics.


Benefits


Robust, fast and accurate solving capability for a full range of
                                    MBS applications
An encompassing array of standard and advanced modeling elements
                                    as well as kinematic, static/quasi-static, transient and linear
                                    solution types 
Ability to directly reuse ADAMS
.adm/.acf files,
                                    functions and user subroutine source code
Support and easy to setup co-simulation with Altair
Activate, Altair
AcuSolve, MATLAB Simulink and Fluidon DSH Plus
No need to compile user subroutines with MotionSolve’s support of Python and MATLAB scripted user subs (and support
                                    for C++/FORTRAN user sub syntax)
Customizable at several levels including custom elements,
                                    functions, messaging, and results




For more information, reference the MotionSolve help
                manual.

Altair
HyperXtrude
HyperXtrude is a suite of finite element solvers for
                simulating the following manufacturing processes.
Metal Extrusion
Polymer Extrusion
Metal Rolling
Billet Forging
Friction Stir Welding
Resin Transfer Molding


All these solvers are supported by easy to use interfaces under Manufacturing
                Solutions.


Benefits for Metal Extrusion


Direct and indirect extrusion
Solid and hollow profile extrusion·
Single and multi-hole dies
Multi-cycle analysis
Bearing profile optimization
Nose cone prediction
Transverse weld length 
Microstructure prediction
Weld strength prediction
Tool deflection analysis
Billet skin and product quality
Support for commonly used material models
Extrusion of super alloys with glass pad lubrication
User-defined function of material models and results
Coupled extrusion and tool deflection analysis


Benefits for Polymer Extrusion


Sheet extrusion
Profile extrusion
Coextrusion of seals
Coextrusion of tires
Hollow and solid profiles
Calibrator analysis
Tube extrusion
Runner balancing analysis




In addition, the solver has the following functionalities that enable the accurate
                analysis of the above mentioned features:
Support for commonly used material models
Viscoelastic model
Ability to include heat transfer and stress work converted to heat
Prediction of profile deformation
Deformation of material interfaces between layers coextrusion 
Ability to include inserts in analysis
Residence time computation
Tool deflection analysis
User-defined function of material models and results


Benefits for Metal Rolling


Prediction of slab deformation
Tool deflection analysis with Radioss
Heat transfer and temperature dependence of flow stress
Support for commonly used material models
User-defined function of material model and results


Benefits for Billet Forging
Billet forging is used to change the shape of cast billet to a desired
                            cross-section and more importantly achieve a desired microstructure.
                            Following features supported by the solver makes it a valuable tool for
                            billet forging simulation.
Validate and optimize forging sequence
Compute forces on tool components
Predict microstructure changes


Benefits for Stir Welding
Friction stir welding is solid state welding process that can join
                            dissimilar metals
Compute forces acting on tool
Tool deflection analysis 
Understand mixing and heat transfer in heat affected zone


Benefits for Resin Transfer Molding
Resin transfer molding and its variants are used for manufacturing
                                composites.
Resin flow front simulation
Fill time prediction
Effects of heat transfer in filling and curing
Air modeled as compressible material to consider vacuum
                                    effects
Curing kinetics
Gravity effects on filling
Local coordinate system for preform material data




For more information, reference the HyperXtrude help
                manual.

Altair Manufacturing Solver
Altair Manufacturing Solver is a state-of-the-art solver suite for manufacturing
                applications built on a parallel, modular and extensible framework that is suitable
                for simulations of manufacturing processes. The current version of Manufacturing
                Solver includes a casting solver that is used under Altair Inspire Cast and an
                injection molding solver that has an interface in Altair SimLab.


Casting Simulation: Supported Features
Metal casting is a widely used manufacturing process used to mold metal
                            into a desired shape. This is achieved by pouring a liquid metal into a
                            mold and cooling it to solidify the part. There are many varieties of
                            casting processes that depend on how the molten metal is delivered into
                            the mold, the type of material used to make the mold, and the cooling
                            techniques. The casting solver supports the following features:

Supported common casting techniques


High pressure die casting
Low pressure die casting
Investment casting
Gravity sand and die casting
Gravity tilt pouring
Gravity tilt pouring with crucible
Gravity with constant liquid level on the
                                                  sprue
High pressure die casting with shot sleeve
Cycling


Supported standard casting components
The solver supports the modeling of standard casting
                                            components, such as:
Core
Chiller
Riser
Isothermal and exothermal sleeves
Overflow
Mold
Cooler
Filter
Shot sleeve
Crucible


Supported computed results


Flow Front
Velocity
Pressure
Temperature
Cold Shuts
Air Entrapment
Flow length
Mold Erosion
Solid Fraction evolution
Shrinkage porosity
Pipe shrinkage
Solidification Modulus
Niyama
Microporosity
Solidification time





Modeling Simulation: Supported Features
Injection molding is one of the most common processes used for the
                            production of polymer parts. This is a cyclic process and often used
                            with thermoplastic polymers. A polymer in the form of pellets is mixed
                            with other additives, then heated to a melt state, and finally
                            pressurized in a single screw extruder. This pressurized polymer melt is
                            injected into the mold at a high flow rate to fill the mold cavities.
                            These cavities are made in the form of the final part accounting for the
                            shrinkage, and then the mold is cooled and the part is ejected from the
                            mold as soon as it is stable enough for ejection. This is a cyclic
                            process and this sequence repeats. Altair Manufacturing Solver is used
                            for simulating the injection molding process. The following features are
                            supported: 

Supported solution sequences


Filling
Filling + Cooling
Filling + Cooling + Warpage
Cooling
Cooling + Warpage
Filling + Packing
Filling + Packing + Cooling
Filling + Packing + Cooling + Warpage


Support for fiber orientation analysis
Fiber orientation analysis is supported and can be
                                            optionally turned on. 
Filling solution module
The filling solution module supports:
Velocity driven filling
Velocity/pressure (VP) switch over
Final pressure driven filling
Gates can be timed with table data


Supported packing stage phases
The packing stage includes both packing and holding
                                            phases.
Model support
The solver can support models that contain:
Complete or partial runner system
Single or multi-cavity molds
Analysis with or without mold plates and mold
                                                  inserts
Analysis with or without part inserts
Symmetry conditions


Supported computed results


Air traps
Density
Fill time
Pressure
Temperature
Velocity
Maximum velocity
Strain rate
Weld surface
Viscosity 
Sink marks
Fiber orientation tensor
Warpage - displacement
Warpage - stresses








Altair
AcuSolve
AcuSolve is a leading general-purpose finite element
                based Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) flow solver with superior robustness,
                speed, and accuracy. AcuSolve can be used by designers
                and research engineers with all levels of expertise to obtain quality solutions
                quickly without iterating on solution procedures. 
AcuSolve is based on the Galerkin/Least-Squares (GLS)
                finite element formulation,  which provides second order accuracy for spatial
                discretization of all variables and utilizes tightly controlled numerical diffusion
                operators to obtain stability and maintain accuracy. Since AcuSolve obtains rapid nonlinear convergence within each time
                step, temporal accuracy is achieved in practice. AcuSolve has a very rich mathematical foundation, translating into superb numerical
                behavior.
AcuSolve consists of multiple features to easily solve
                the largest and most complex mission critical industrial problems spanning a wide
                range of physics such as steady and unsteady flows, conjugate heat transfer
                including radiation in semi-transparent media, solar radiation, nucleate boiling,
                multiphase flow, moving meshes and rigid body dynamics, shape and parametric
                optimization, etc. 
AcuSolve is based on an efficient parallel architecture
                that provides distributed, shared and hybrid parallel operation in addition to GPU
                acceleration. 
AcuSolve can be coupled with external codes such as
                    OptiStruct, Flux,
                    MotionSolve, and EDEM to
                perform multiphysics analysis of complex scenarios in an efficient manner. 


The key benefits of AcuSolve include:


Robustness: Most problems are solved on the first attempt.
Speed: Fully coupled solver on shared memory and distributed
                                    parallel systems in addition to GPU acceleration.
Accuracy: Highly accurate in space and time while globally and
                                    locally conservative.
Multiphysics: Coupling with external software to solve
                                    multiphysics analysis. 


High Fidelity Solver for Flow and Heat Transfer


Navier-Stokes equations for incompressible and subsonic
                                    compressible flows. 
Stokes model for creeping flow where the viscosity of the fluid
                                    is high. 
Convective heat transfer due to the motion of molecules within a
                                    fluid, including forced convection and natural convection solved
                                    with the Boussinesq density model. 
Conjugate heat transfer analysis in both solids and fluid media. 
Thermal shell feature defined as material medium to simulate
                                    heat transfer in thin solid media. 
Viscous and compression heating in case of highly viscous flows
                                    and variable density flows. 
A full set of material models for investigating Newtonian and
                                    non-Newtonian flow fields. 
Single phase nucleate boiling model to predict local changes in
                                    heat flux due to boiling by employing Chen’s correlation. 
Multi-species transport equations to track multiple species in a
                                    fluid flow. 


Rich Choices of Turbulence Models for Turbulent Flow Analysis


One and two-equation Reynolds Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS)
                                    models for industry applications. 
One and two-equation transition models for solving transition
                                    phenomena between laminar flow and turbulent flow. 
Smagorinsky and dynamic sub-grid scale Large Eddy Simulation
                                    (LES) models to accurately predict transient turbulence flow. 
Hybrid RANS/LES models as a choice between fast RANS models and
                                    expensive but accurate LES. 


Radiation Heat Transfer Modeling 


Surface to surface radiation heat transfer using gray body
                                    enclosure radiation model with distributed memory parallel
                                    view-factor computation. 
P1 radiation model to model incident radiation in a gray,
                                    optically thick participating medium. 
Discrete ordinates radiation model for modeling radiation heat
                                    transfer across semi-transparent media using radiation
                                    interfaces. 
Ideal gray surface solar radiation model support to calculate
                                    solar heat fluxes using a ray tracing algorithm.  


Multiphase Flow Analysis


Levelset method for interface tracking between two immiscible
                                    fluids. 
Algebraic Eulerian (Mixture) model for modeling
                                    inter-penetrating and dispersed fields. 
Humidity modeling to specify and quantify condensation and
                                    evaporation on surfaces in terms of humidity film
                                    thickness.
Multiphase nucleate boiling to predict the onset of nucleate
                                    boiling, prompting the air bubble generation at the nucleation
                                    site. 


Multiphysics Capabilities 


Rigid body dynamics coupling. 
Direct-Coupling with Altair
OptiStruct to run in a fully-coupled
                                    manner for nonlinear fluid/structure interaction analysis using
                                        Altair's own proprietary
                                    code-coupling interface (CCI) library. 
Direct-Coupling with Altair
MotionSolve for multi-body dynamics
                                    coupling. 
One-way coupling using acuOptiStruct for thermal stress
                                    analysis.
One-way coupling with Altair
OptiStruct to compute the small
                                    structural deformation. 
One-way coupling with Altair
Flux for electromagnetic
                                    thermal-flow interactions. 
One-way coupling with Altair
EDEM for particle interactions.
                                


Moving Mesh Technology 


Specified or interpolated mesh approaches for simple mesh
                                    motion. 
Arbitrary Lagrangian Eulerian (ALE) algorithm for complex
                                    deforming mesh motions. 
Flexible body mesh movement. 
Free surface simulation. 
Guide surface technology. 
Sliding/non-conformal mesh technology. 


Optimization 


Parametric and shape optimization studies completely with
                                        AcuSolve. 
Optimization of general objectives and constraints. 
Geometric constraints. 
3D shapes tool to generate mesh free morph shapes – spline
                                    technology. 
Integration with HyperMorph for
                                    shape optimization studies. 
3D printing export capabilities. 
Perform design exploration studies by coupling with HyperStudy.   


Particle Tracing 


Spherical finite mass and massless particle tracing available as
                                    a post-processing or co-processing step. 
Works with steady and unsteady flows, fixed or moving meshes.
                                


Enhanced Boundary Conditions 


Atmospheric boundary layer inlet profile support for atmospheric
                                    external flow. 
Surface gravity wave inlet support for offshore applications. 
Automatic wall treatment to simplify the CFD set-up workflow for
                                    complex industry models. 
Automatic turbulence input parameter calculation based on the
                                    turbulence flow types. 
Synthetic turbulence feature for atmospheric external flow. 
Automatic turbulent Prandtl number calculation based on local
                                    flow and material properties.   


Component Technology 


Simplified fan component model. 
Simplified heat exchanger model. 
Porous media support.   


Fast Computing Time using GPU Acceleration 
Altair
AcuSolve is supported on CUDA-enabled
                            graphical processing units for even faster performance.
Powerful User-Defined Function (UDF) Capability 


Allows definition of custom material models, source terms,
                                    boundary conditions, mesh motion, etc. 
Client-server interface with external programs.   




For more information, reference the AcuSolve help
                manual.

Altair
Feko + WinProp
Feko + WinProp is a comprehensive computational
                electromagnetics (CEM) code used widely in the telecommunications, automobile, space
                and defense industries. Feko + WinProp offers several
                frequency and time domain EM solvers. Hybridization of these methods enables the
                efficient analysis of a broad spectrum of EM problems, including antennas,
                microstrip circuits, RF components and biomedical systems, the placement of antennas
                on electrically large structures, the calculation of scattering as well as the
                investigation of electromagnetic compatibility (EMC). 
Feko + WinProp also offers tools that are tailored to
                solve more challenging EM interactions, including dedicated solvers for
                characteristic mode analysis (CMA) and bi-directional cables coupling. Special
                formulations are also included for efficient simulation of integrated windscreen
                antennas and antenna arrays.
Combined with the MLFMM, and the true hybridization of the solvers, Feko + WinProp is considered the global market leader for
                antenna placement analysis.


Benefits


Multiple solvers for users to choose the best method for the
                                    problem they are trying to solve
Industry leading hybridization of different methods when solving
                                    complex and electrically large problems
Excellent performance and reliable accuracy founded on extensive
                                    validation of the solver’s numerical methods.
Specialized solutions, such as characteristic mode analysis
                                    (CMA), bidirectional cable coupling, windscreen antennas and
                                    large finite arrays
Model decomposition workflows for classical antenna placement
                                    and EMC problems




For more information, reference the Feko + WinProp help
                manual.

Altair
Flux
Flux is the leading software for electromagnetic and
                thermal simulations. For more than 30 years, Flux
                simulation software has been used worldwide in the industry and university labs. It
                has become a reference for the high accuracy it delivers. It is a versatile,
                efficient and user-friendly tool that will help to generate optimized and
                high-performance products, in less time and with fewer prototypes. Flux can be used to simulate rotating electromotors, linear
                actuators and solenoids, transformers, induction heating processes, sensors, cables,
                and their electric connections. The electromagnetic compatibility of components can
                also be evaluated.


Benefits


Accurate results in a very short time for thousands of design
                                    configurations
Fully customizable user preferences and automation with embedded
                                    scripting tools
Parameters for geometric dimensions or physical characteristics
                                    enable design exploration
Different levels of interaction ranging from reduced model
                                    extraction to full co-simulation
Coupling and co-simulation with systems analysis tools and 3D
                                    simulation software to generate most realistic analysis
                                    results

结构设计与优化
结构设计工具包括拓扑、地形和自由尺寸
优化。提供尺寸、形状和自由形状优化
用于结构优化。
在制定设计和优化问题时
响应可以作为目标或约束：顺从，
频率、体积、质量、惯性矩、重心，
位移、速度、加速度、屈曲系数、应力、应变，
复合失效、力、合成响应和外部（用户-

（接触）、法向模式、屈曲和频率响应解决方案可以
包含在多学科优化设置中。
拓扑、拓扑、大小和形状优化可以组合在
一般问题公式。
基于可靠性的设计优化可用于提供最佳

拓扑优化

求解最小顺应性的经典拓扑优化设置
问题，以及具有多个约束的对偶公式

可用但有限制。可以施加制造限制

重复
外壳设计空间可自由进行尺寸优化。外壳
每个元件的厚度或复合层厚度是设计
变量

在结构的一部分发生故障的情况下的可行性。
晶格结构优化，一种新颖的解决方案，用于创建混合
实体和格构结构从概念到详细的最终设计

以及钢筋的位置，以满足某些性能要求。
典型应用包括面板加固和管理
频率。

可以分配给扰动向量，该向量控制
模型变量也可以分配给属性，这些属性控制
厚度、面积、惯性矩、刚度和非结构质量
模型中元素的数量。OptiStruct支持的所有变量都可以使用Altair进行分配
HyperMesh。形状扰动矢量可以是
使用HyperMorph创建。

形状优化。形状扰动通过以下方式自动确定
OptiStruct（基于应力水平
在设计中）。

这些材料的厚度和铺层角度。
多体动力学分析

可获得的其中包括运动学、动力学、静态和准静态
解决。柔性体可以从任何有限元模型中导出
在OptiStruct中定义。

手册

结构设计的耐撞性、安全性和可制造性。超过
25年来，Radioss已成为一个领导者

对于MBS，其中一些包括线性和振动研究、应力和耐久性

强大、快速、准确的解决能力

HyperXtrude
HyperXtrude是一套用于

金属挤压
聚合物挤出

钢坯锻造

解决。

直接和间接挤压
实心和空心型材挤出·
单孔和多孔模具
多周期分析

采用玻璃衬垫润滑的超级合金挤压
材料模型和结果的用户定义功能
挤压与刀具变形耦合分析


聚合物挤出的好处


板材挤出
型材挤出
密封件的共挤
轮胎共挤
空心和实心型材
校准器分析
卡套管挤出
转轮平衡分析




此外，解算器具有以下功能，可以实现
分析上述特征：
支持常用材料模型
粘弹性模型
包括热传递和转化为热的应力功的能力
剖面变形预测
层间材料界面的共同挤压变形
能够在分析中包含插入项
停留时间计算
刀具偏转分析
材料模型和结果的用户定义功能


金属轧制的好处


板坯变形预测
使用Radioss进行刀具偏转分析
流动应力的传热和温度依赖性
支持常用材料模型
材料模型和结果的用户定义功能


方坯锻造的好处
坯料锻造用于将铸坯的形状改变为所需形状
并且更重要的是实现期望的微观结构。
解算器支持的以下功能使其成为有价值的工具
方坯锻造模拟。
验证和优化锻造顺序
计算工具组件上的力
预测微观结构变化


搅拌焊接的好处
搅拌摩擦焊是一种可以连接的固态焊接工艺
异种金属
计算作用在工具上的力
刀具偏转分析
了解热影响区的混合和传热


树脂转移模塑的好处
树脂转移模塑及其变体用于制造
复合材料。
树脂流动前沿模拟
填充时间预测
填充和固化过程中的传热效应
空气建模为可压缩材料以考虑真空
影响
固化动力学
重力对填土的影响
预制件材料数据的局部坐标系




有关更多信息，请参阅HyperXtrude帮助
手册

Altair制造解决方案
Altair Manufacturing Solver是最先进的制造解决方案套件
构建在并行、模块化和可扩展框架上的应用程序
用于模拟制造过程。当前版本的制造
解算器包括一个在Altair Inspire Cast和
在Altair SimLab中具有接口的注塑求解器。


铸造模拟：支持的功能
金属铸造是一种广泛使用的制造工艺，用于成型金属
形成所需形状。这是通过将液态金属倒入
模具并冷却以固化零件。有很多种
取决于熔融金属如何输送到
模具、用于制造模具的材料类型以及冷却
技术。铸造解算器支持以下功能：

支持的常见铸造技术


高压压铸
低压压铸
熔模铸造
重力砂和压铸
重力倾斜浇筑
坩埚重力倾斜浇注
具有恒定液位的重力
浇口
带套筒的高压压铸
骑脚踏车兜风


支持的标准铸件
求解器支持标准铸件的建模
组件，例如：
果心
冷却器
立管
等温和放热套筒
溢流
模具
冷却器
滤器
喷丸套筒
坩埚


支持的计算结果


Flow Front
速度
压力
温度
冷关闭
空气滞留
流量长度
霉菌侵蚀
固体馏分演变
收缩孔隙度
管道收缩
凝固模量
Niyama
微孔性
固化时间





建模仿真：支持的功能
注射成型是用于
聚合物部件的生产。这是一个循环过程，经常使用
与热塑性聚合物。将颗粒形式的聚合物混合
与其他添加剂混合，然后加热至熔融状态，最后
在单螺杆挤出机中加压。这种加压聚合物熔体是
以高流速注入模具中以填充模腔。
这些空腔以最终零件的形式制成
收缩，然后模具冷却，零件从
模具一旦稳定到可以脱模。这是一个循环
过程，并且该序列重复。使用Altair制造解算器
用于模拟注射成型过程。以下功能是
支持：

支持的解决方案序列


填满
加注+冷却
填充+冷却+翘曲
冷却
冷却+翘曲
灌装+包装
灌装+包装+冷却
灌装+包装+冷却+翘曲


支持纤维方向分析
支持光纤定向分析，并且可以
可选地打开。
灌装溶液模块
灌装解决方案模块支持：
速度驱动填充
速度/压力（VP）切换
最终压力驱动填充
门可以用表格数据计时


支持的填料阶段
包装阶段包括包装和保持
阶段。
模型支持
解算器可以支持包含以下内容的模型：
完整或部分转轮系统
单腔或多腔模具
带或不带模板和模具的分析
插入件
带或不带零件插入件的分析
对称性条件


支持的计算结果


空气收集器
密集
填充时间
压力
温度
速度
最大速度
应变率
焊缝表面
粘度
水槽标记
纤维取向张量
翘曲-位移
翘曲-应力








Altair
AcuSolve
AcuSolve是领先的通用有限元
基于计算流体动力学（CFD）的流动求解器，具有优越的鲁棒性，
速度和准确性。设计师可以使用AcuSolve
和拥有各级专业知识的研究工程师，以获得高质量的解决方案
快速而无需迭代解决方案过程。
AcuSolve基于伽辽金/最小二乘法（GLS）
有限元公式，为空间
所有变量的离散化并利用严格控制的数值扩散
操作员以获得稳定性并保持准确性。由于AcuSolve每次都能获得快速的非线性收敛
步骤，在实践中实现了时间精度。AcuSolve拥有非常丰富的数学基础，可以转化为高超的数值
行为
AcuSolve由多个功能组成，可轻松解决
涉及广泛的最大和最复杂的任务关键型工业问题
物理范围，如稳定和非稳定流动、共轭传热
包括半透明介质中的辐射、太阳辐射、核沸腾，
多相流、移动网格和刚体动力学、形状和参数
优化等。
AcuSolve基于高效的并行体系结构
除了GPU之外，还提供分布式、共享和混合并行操作
加快
AcuSolve可以与外部代码耦合，例如
OptiStruct、Flux、，
MotionSolve和EDEM
以有效的方式对复杂场景进行多物理分析。


AcuSolve的主要优点包括：


稳健性：大多数问题在第一次尝试时就解决了。
速度：共享内存和分布式上的完全耦合解算器
并行系统以及GPU加速。
准确性：在空间和时间上高度准确，同时在全球和
局部保守。
多重物理：与外部软件耦合以解决
多重物理分析。


流动和传热的高保真解算器


不可压缩和亚音速的Navier-Stokes方程
可压缩流。
爬行流的Stokes模型，其中流体的粘度
是高的。
由于分子在
流体，包括强制对流和自然对流
使用Boussinesq密度模型。
固体和流体介质中的共轭传热分析。
热壳特征定义为要模拟的材料介质
薄固体介质中的热传递。
高粘性流情况下的粘性和压缩加热
以及可变密度流动。
用于研究牛顿和
非牛顿流场。
单相核沸腾模型用于预测
通过使用陈的相关性，得出沸腾引起的热通量。
多物种运输方程，用于跟踪
流体流动。


湍流分析中湍流模型的丰富选择


一方程和二方程Reynolds Averaged Navier-Stokes（RANS）
行业应用的模型。
求解过渡的一方程和二方程过渡模型
层流和湍流之间的现象。
Smagorinsky与动态子网格尺度大涡模拟
（LES）模型，以准确预测瞬态湍流。
混合RANS/LES模型作为快速RANS模型和
昂贵但准确的LES。


辐射传热模型


灰体表面辐射传热
分布式存储器并行的外壳辐射模型
视图因子计算。
P1辐射模型以将入射辐射建模为灰色，
光学厚的参与介质。
用于辐射热建模的离散纵坐标辐射模型
利用辐射在半透明介质上传输
接口。
理想灰色地表太阳辐射模型支持计算
使用射线追踪算法的太阳热通量。


多相流分析


两个不混溶体界面跟踪的Levelset方法
流体。
用于建模的代数欧拉（混合）模型
相互渗透和分散的场。
湿度建模，以指定和量化冷凝和
以湿膜形式表示的表面蒸发
厚
预测成核开始的多相成核沸腾
沸腾，促使气泡在成核处产生
地点


多重物理功能


刚体动力学耦合。
与Altair的直接耦合
OptiStruct在完全耦合的环境中运行
非线性流体/结构相互作用分析的方法
Altair自己的专利
代码耦合接口（CCI）库。
与Altair的直接耦合
用于多体动力学的MotionSolve
联轴器。
使用acuOptiStruct进行热应力单向耦合
分析
与Altair的单向耦合
OptiStruct计算小型
结构变形。
与Altair的单向耦合
电磁通量
热流相互作用。
与Altair的单向耦合
粒子相互作用的EDEM。



移动网格技术


简单网格的指定或插值网格方法
运动
复数的任意拉格朗日-欧拉（ALE）算法
使网格运动变形。
灵活的身体网格运动。
自由曲面模拟。
引导表面技术。
滑动/非保形网格技术。


优化


参数化和形状优化研究完全与
AcuSolve。
总体目标和约束条件的优化。
几何约束。
生成无网格变形形状的三维形状工具-样条曲线
技术
与HyperMorph的集成
形状优化研究。
3D打印导出功能。
通过与HyperStudy耦合进行设计探索研究。


粒子跟踪


球形有限质量和无质量粒子追踪可用作
后处理或共同处理步骤。
适用于稳定和非稳定流、固定或移动网格。



增强边界条件


大气边界层入口剖面对大气的支持
外部流动。
用于海上应用的表面重力波入口支撑。
自动壁处理，简化CFD设置工作流程
复杂的行业模型。
基于的湍流输入参数自动计算
湍流类型。
大气外部流动的合成湍流特征。
基于局部的湍流普朗特数自动计算
流动和材料特性。


组件技术


简化的风扇组件模型。
简化的热交换器模型。
多孔介质支撑。


使用GPU加速的快速计算时间
Altair
启用CUDA时支持AcuSolve
图形处理单元，实现更快的性能。
强大的用户定义函数（UDF）功能


允许定义自定义材料模型、源术语、，
边界条件、网格运动等。
客户端-服务器与外部程序的接口。




有关更多信息，请参阅AcuSolve帮助
手册

Altair
Feko+WinProp
Feko+WinProp是一个综合计算
电磁学代码广泛应用于电信、汽车、航天等领域
以及国防工业。Feko+WinProp提供了几个
频域和时域EM解算器。这些方法的混合使
有效地分析包括天线在内的广泛频谱的EM问题，
微带电路、射频元件和生物医学系统、天线的放置
在电气大型结构上，散射的计算以及
电磁兼容性研究。
Feko+WinProp还提供针对
解决更具挑战性的EM交互，包括用于
特征模式分析（CMA）和双向电缆耦合。特殊的
还包括有效模拟集成式挡风玻璃的公式
天线和天线阵列。
结合MLFMM和解算器的真正杂交，Feko+WinProp被认为是全球市场的领导者
天线布局分析。


好处


多个解算器供用户选择最佳方法
他们试图解决的问题
行业领先的不同方法的混合解决方案
复杂的电气大问题
卓越的性能和可靠的精度建立在广泛的基础上
验证求解器的数值方法。
专门的解决方案，如特征模式分析
（CMA）、双向电缆耦合、挡风玻璃天线和
大型有限阵列
经典天线布局的模型分解工作流
和EMC问题




有关更多信息，请参阅Feko+WinProp帮助
手册

Altair
通量
Flux是领先的电磁和
热模拟。30多年来，Flux
仿真软件已在世界各地的工业和大学实验室中使用。它
已成为其提供的高精度的参考。它是一个多功能的，
高效和用户友好的工具，将有助于生成优化的和
高性能产品，用更少的时间和更少的原型。通量可用于模拟旋转电机，线性
致动器和螺线管、变压器、感应加热过程、传感器、电缆、，
以及它们的电连接。组件的电磁兼容性可以
也要进行评估。


好处


在很短的时间内为数千个设计提供准确的结果
配置
完全可定制的用户偏好和嵌入式自动化
脚本工具
几何尺寸或物理特性的参数
实现设计探索
从简化模型到不同级别的交互
提取到完全协同仿真
与系统分析工具和3D的耦合和协同仿真
生成最真实分析的模拟软件
后果

doc_content:
Manufacturing Solutions
Unified environment for manufacturing process simulation, analysis, and design
        optimization.
HyperForm
HyperForm provides a unique finite element based sheet metal forming simulation
                environment. It combines an extremely fast one-step and incremental forming solution
                based on Altair
Radioss solver technology with the customized geometry
                manipulation and mesh generation capabilities of Altair
HyperMesh. HyperForm's Die Module takes a giant leap in
                bringing the product designer closer to manufacturing by enabling engineers to
                create and analyze conceptual die designs in order to generate an optimized die. Die
                concepts can then be read into any CAD system as a starting block for the actual die
                build. The Blank Nesting tool allows manual or automatic search for single or
                multiple blank configurations in order to maximize material utilization. HyperForm
                can export data in Altair H3D format allowing results to be visualized using
                    Altair
HyperView Player with any web browser. HyperForm 1Step
                and incremental analyses are tightly integrated with HyperMorph and Altair
HyperStudy, which allows the optimization of forming
                tools and process parameters using a highly automated approach.
Benefits


Introduces forming feasibility criteria early in product
                                    development, where the most significant improvements are
                                    possible
Accurately predicts the blank size for improved material
                                    utilization
Provides a powerful tool to modify and verify multiple process
                                    scenarios with the ability to record and reuse complex model
                                    setup for repeatability of best practices
Visualizes wrinkles and splits, and fixes problems before
                                    cutting any steel
Provides powerful geometric tools for designing binder and
                                    parametric addendum
Provides an automated approach for optimization of stamping
                                    processes
Minimizes material wastage via blank nesting
Model setup for tailor welded blank and layered blanks
New GUI to quickly set up optimization problems in sheet metal
                                    forming
Springback positioner – Positions the part after springback
                                    relative to tools based on user preferences. 
Model setup for Hot stamping using LSDYNA
Drastically reduces the overall product cycle 



The HyperForm help describes the unique features of HyperForm. Consult the
                    HyperMesh help, User’s Guide for more information on
                    HyperMesh-specific features.
For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

HyperXtrude
HyperXtrude User profile under Manufacturing Solutions
                provides an easy to use interface for HyperXtrude
                solvers for metal extrusion, polymer processing, and metal rolling simulation. Refer
                to Solvers of this introduction for more
                details about these solvers. All the sub-profiles under this user profile have the
                following benefits.
Benefits


Easy to use interface 
Meshing wizards for quick model setup 
HyperXtrude Job Manager to submit
                                    and manage local/remote jobs
Built-in and expandable material database
Process specific model setup tools
Wizard for tool deflection analysis using Altair
OptiStruct




Some of the key process customizations are listed below.
Metal Extrusion


Extrusion wizard for setting up for all problem classes
                                    supported by the solver
Tools for bearing design and optimization
Tube extrusion wizard


Polymer Extrusion


Wizard for extrusion using plate dies
Coextrusion wizard to simulate coextruded parts with or without
                                    metal inserts and tool
Interface to setup to runner balancing analysis
Interface to setup a generic melt flow analysis
Tire extrusion analysis wizard
Easy to use interface for CFD tetrameshing




For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

HyperMold
HyperMold provides a highly efficient and customized environment for the following
                    solvers:
Moldex3D Solid
Moldex3D Shell
Moldflow (Midplane, Fusion, and Solid 3D)
HyperXtrude for Resin Transfer Molding


Key features and benefits for each of these solvers are listed below.
Moldex3D
This user profile supports model setup for three dimensional injection
                            molding simulations using Moldex3D Solid solver.
Benefits


Easy to use meshing wizards for model creation
Support for standard and fast cool analysis
Model diagnostics (similar to the solver)




Moldflow
This user profile supports model setup for injection molding simulations
                            using Autodesk® Simulation Moldflow® software.
Benefits


Support for Midplane, Fusion (dual domain), and
                                                Flow3D analysis
Easy to use wizards to setup models for all three
                                                model types
Model diagnostics includes fusion mesh match
                                                estimator
Tools to create runner system and cooling
                                                circuits




RTM
This user profile supports model setup for resin transfer molding
                            simulations using HyperXtrude solver for
                            RTM. 
Benefits


Solid meshing wizard to mesh the model starting from
                                                solids
Interface for material database to add, edit, and
                                                maintain material data
Tools to create boundary and process conditions






For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

HyperWeld
HyperWeld provides an efficient interface for setting up models and analyzing
                friction stir welding with the Altair
HyperXtrude Solver.
Benefits


Easy to use wizard for setting up models for butt, edge, lap and
                                    T-joints 
Built-in and expandable material database
Tools to create and setup models with complex pin shapes and
                                    other joints not supported by the wizard




For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

Forging
The Forging user profile provides a highly efficient and customized environment for
                    solvers.
HyperXtrude for Billet Forging
DEFORM3D
HX-Forge
HX-Forge user profile has an easy to use interface for HyperXtrude for Billet Forging. Refer to
                                        Solvers of this
                                    introduction for more details about this solver.
Benefits


Easy to use GUI for automatic model
                                                  generation
Built-in and expandable material library
Tools to manually setup models




DEFORM3D
Interface to set up models for complex three-dimensional forging
                                    simulation with DEFOM3D is supported by this user profile. It
                                    gives you direct access to Altair
HyperMesh-based tools such as
                                    geometry cleanup, tetramesh generation, and autopositioning in
                                    order to prepare data for analysis and export it to native
                                    DEFORM3D formats. In addition, HyperMorph allows you to evaluate rapid
                                    changes to tooling and perform geometry.
Benefits


Minimizes modeling time for forging analysis 
Enables rapid design changes








For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

Results Manager
Altair
HyperWorks Results Mapper is a tool that provides a
                framework to initialize a structural model with results from a forming simulation.
                It is based on the HyperCrash architecture.
Benefits


Incorporates the manufacturing effects into structural
                                    analysis
Open environment that allows mapping of data between arbitrary
                                    solvers




For more information, reference the Manufacturing Solutions help manual.

制造解决方案
用于制造过程模拟、分析和设计的统一环境
优化。
HyperForm
HyperForm提供了一种独特的基于有限元的钣金成形模拟
环境它结合了极其快速的一步成型和增量成型解决方案
基于Altair
具有自定义几何体的无辐射解算器技术
Altair的操作和网格生成能力
HyperMesh。HyperForm的模具模块在
通过使工程师能够
创建和分析概念模具设计，以便生成优化的模具。死亡
然后可以将概念读取到任何CAD系统中，作为实际模具的起始块
建筑空白嵌套工具允许手动或自动搜索单个或
多个坯料配置，以最大限度地提高材料利用率。HyperForm
可以导出Altair H3D格式的数据，允许使用可视化结果
Altair
具有任何web浏览器的HyperView播放器。HyperForm 1步骤
增量分析与HyperMorph和Altair紧密集成
HyperStudy，允许优化成型
工具和工艺参数。
好处


在产品早期引入成型可行性标准
发展，其中最显著的改进是
可能的
准确预测改进材料的坯料尺寸
利用
提供一个强大的工具来修改和验证多个进程
具有记录和重用复杂模型能力的场景
最佳实践的可重复性设置

doc_content:
Engineering Solutions
Unified environment for vertical engineering disciplines for simulation, analysis,
        and design optimization.
Crash
The new Crash application in Engineering Solutions offers a tailored environment in
                    HyperWorks that efficiently steers the Crash CAE
                specialist in CAE model building, starting from CAD geometry and finishing with a
                runnable solver deck in both solvers Altair
Radioss and LS-DYNA. A one-way
                transfer to Altair
HyperCrash to complete safety setup within Altair
HyperWorks is also available.
For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

CFD
Engineering Solutions offers a wide range of tools enabling the user to perform CFD
                modeling in an efficient manner.
Import interfaces for all major CAD tools (CATIA, Creo, NX,…)
Powerful geometry - FE based cleanup/generation capabilities
Several surface meshing algorithms for curvature dependent surface meshing
                        with local refinement and user-defined growth rate
Robust volume mesh generation, such as BL mesh, tetramesh, hybrid grids or
                        hex-core meshing
Native export/import interfaces for all major CFD tools
Several surface meshing algorithms, such as BL mesh, tetramesh, curvature
                        dependent surface meshing with local refinement and user-defined growth
                        rate
Robust volume mesh generation, such as hybrid grids or hex-core meshing
Native export/import interfaces for all major CFD tools
Case setup and solver launch for CFD solver Altair
AcuSolve
CFD post-processing in Altair
HyperView
Smooth integration of Altair
HyperStudy and AcuSolve to perform optimization studies


For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

Noise and Vibration
The NVH user profile is a Altair
HyperWorks environment customized for automotive full
                vehicle NVH modeling and analysis needs. It includes a number of integrated
                components to help NVH users execute a typical full vehicle analysis process.
Benefits


Simulation of real-world events 
Directly simulate customer usage experience
Drive physical prototype development
Identify problems related to specific
                                            loadcase/response
Understand cost and benefit


Physical root cause understanding
Identify source-path-receiver clearly 
Most effective solutions often come from source
                                            reduction
Understand noise/vibration energy transfer paths
Identify most sensitive parts and cost effective
                                            solutions
Validate CAE model through trend prediction 
Obtain force distribution for component level analysis
                                            and optimization


Ability to apply the entire NVH toolset
Effective problem resolution requires using the right
                                            tools
Low frequency – modal alignment and contribution
                                            analysis
Mid frequency – transfer path, point mobility, and panel
                                            analysis
Effective isolation
Mass damper and tuned mass dampers
Mastic or beads on panels
Optimization






For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

Aerospace
This profile is aimed to help to capture the aerospace model building process and
                tools needed for automation.
For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

Durability Director
Altair
HyperWorks Durability Director is a solver-neutral,
                process-oriented customization of HyperWorks that
                addresses many of the challenges associated with assessing the fatigue life of
                mechanical components. Durability Director manages the entire durability process
                from cascading measured loads, to predicting fatigue on individual components in the
                system.
For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

Suspension Director
Suspension Director (SD) is an industry specific solution that is integrated with
                MotionView and utilizes many aspects of Altair
HyperWorks to assist with the engineering of vehicle
                suspensions. SD contains several industry standard suspension topologies and
                analyses and is easily customizable. It utilizes state of the art assembly
                technology in Altair
MotionView and allows you to store and retrieve models
                using Library Manager. When using SD, all aspects of general MotionView are available to the user. 
SD enables you to quickly add, solve and post-process a suspension model that is in
                the library. Or you can customize the library by adding additional suspensions,
                analyses or auto-entities to fit your engineering needs.
For more information, reference the Engineering Solutions help manual.

AcuConsole
Altair
AcuSolve's dedicated Graphical User Interface,
                AcuConsole, contains a full set of options to help you build your CFD models quickly
                and efficiently. It provides full support for AcuSolve's
                features and can be used as an interactive tool or automated in a batch process.
                Intelligent default settings and an intuitive interface make learning the product
                quick and easy. AcuConsole's model set-up process is
                tightly tied to the water tight CAD model that is used to construct the simulation.
                All settings associated with boundary conditions, mesh controls, material
                properties, etc. are stored on the CAD faces and bodies such that these settings can
                be applied at any time during the pre-processing operation. Once the model has been
                meshed, all settings are inherited on the discretized model based on association
                with the geometry. This workflow provides powerful abstract modeling capabilities
                and enables rapid investigation of new designs. All settings are stored within the
                    AcuConsole database and investigating a new
                candidate design is as easy as importing the new CAD model. All settings are
                automatically re-applied based on the similarities between the geometric models.
For more information, reference the AcuSolve help manual.

以有效的方式建模。
导入所有主要CAD工具的接口（CATIA、Creo、NX等）

HyperWorks环境专为汽车定制

以帮助NVH用户执行典型的整车分析过程。
好处


模拟真实世界的事件
直接模拟客户使用体验

航空航天
本简介旨在帮助捕捉航空航天模型构建过程和
自动化所需的工具。

耐久性总监
Altair
HyperWorks Durability Director是一个中立的求解器，
面向过程的HyperWorks定制
解决了与评估疲劳寿命相关的许多挑战
机械部件。耐久性总监管理整个耐久性流程
从级联测量负载，到预测中单个组件的疲劳
系统
有关更多信息，请参阅工程解决方案帮助手册。

停职主管
悬架控制器（SD）是一种特定于行业的解决方案，与
MotionView并利用Altair的许多方面
HyperWorks协助车辆工程
悬浮液。SD包含几种行业标准悬架拓扑结构和
分析，并且易于定制。它利用了最先进的组装技术
Altair的技术
MotionView，允许您存储和检索模型
使用Library Manager。使用SD时，用户可以使用常规MotionView的所有方面。
SD使您能够快速添加、解决和后期处理中的悬架模型
图书馆。或者您可以通过添加额外的悬浮液来定制库，
分析或自动实体，以满足您的工程需求。
有关更多信息，请参阅工程解决方案帮助手册。

AcuConsole
Altair
AcuSolve的专用图形用户界面，
AcuConsole包含一整套选项，可帮助您快速构建CFD模型
并且高效。它为AcuSolve的
功能，可以用作交互式工具或在批处理过程中实现自动化。
智能的默认设置和直观的界面使您能够学习产品
快速而简单。AcuConsole的模型设置过程是
与用于构建仿真的防水CAD模型紧密相连。
与边界条件、网格控件、材质关联的所有设置
属性等存储在CAD面和实体上，使得这些设置可以
