::hwat::math::CheckTransformMatrix d_matrixList

Arguments


d_matrixList
The list contains 9 elements â€“ 3 rotation components for X, Y, and Z
                            respectively



Returns


Success
1; matrix appears to be valid
Failure
{}; matrix is not valid



Example
::hwat::math::CheckTransformMatrix $theMatrixList

Comments
Performs various sanity checks on the given cosine matrix to help ensure that it is a
                valid matrix. If the test fails, the user may want to call the
                    CheckReflection function to see if the matrix has reflective
                properties.

检查给定信息矩阵的有效性。

d_matrixList
该列表包含9个元素“X、Y和Z的3个旋转组件

失败
{}; 矩阵无效



实例
：：hwat:：math:：CheckTransformMatrix$theMatrixList

对给定的余弦矩阵执行各种健全性检查，以帮助确保它是
有效矩阵。如果测试失败，用户可能需要调用
CheckReflection函数查看矩阵是否具有反射
属性。

doc_content:
::hwat::math::ConvertMatrixToRotations
Convert a cosine matrix into three successive rotations.
Syntax

Arguments


d_MatrixList
The list contains 9 elements – 3 rotation components for X, Y, and Z
                            respectively



Returns


Success
1; matrix appears to be valid. The ordered rotation list: {rotX rotY
                            rotZ} on success: 
rotX – rotation X component
rotY – rotation Y component
rotZ – rotation Z component

{}; matrix is not valid transform matrix

The rotation order is always X, then Y, and then Z.

rotZ｝关于成功：
rotX–旋转X分量
rotY–旋转Y分量
rotZ–旋转Z分量


失败
{}; 矩阵不是有效的变换矩阵



实例
：：hwat:：math:：ConvertMatrixToRotations$theMatrixList

评论
旋转顺序始终是X，然后是Y，然后是Z。

doc_content:
::hwat::math::PointOnVector
Finds a point on a vector at a given distance from the tail (starting point) of the
        vector. If the distance is given in percentage, it finds a point at percentage of the total
        vector length.
Syntax
::hwat::math::PointOnVector {startpnt} {endpnt} distance

Arguments


startpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tail node of the vector.
endpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tip node of the vector.
distance
Distance to find the point at.
Default = 50%.



Returns


Success
Tcl list of the x, y and z coordinates of the point on the vector.
Failure
{}



Example
set newLoc [PointOnVector [list 0.0 0.0 0.0] [list 10.0 8.5 7.0] 20 ]

Comments
This is an N-dimensional operation. Both lists must be the same length and the return
                list will also be the same length as the input lists.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：math:：PointOnVector
在距离的尾部（起点）给定距离的向量上查找一个点
矢量。如果距离是以百分比表示的，它会以总距离的百分比找到一个点
矢量长度。
语法
：：hwat:：math:：PointOnVector｛startpnt｝｛endnt｝距离

论据


startpnt
向量尾部节点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表。
endnt
Tcl矢量尖端节点的x、y和z坐标列表。
距离
要查找点的距离。
默认值=50%。



退换商品


成功
向量上点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表。
失败
{}



实例
设置newLoc[PointOnVector[列表0.0 0.0 0.0][列表10.0 8.5 7.0]20]

评论
这是一个N维运算。两个列表的长度必须相同，并且返回
列表的长度也将与输入列表的长度相同。

矢量平均矢量1矢量2[weight1][weight2]

失败
{}



实例

这是一个N维运算。输入列表的长度必须相等，并且
返回的列表将具有相同的长度。

::hwat::solver::ChangeFormulation
Changes the formulation for displayed components to the desired value if
        required.
Syntax
::hwat::solver::ChangeFormulation str_newForm {str_OldForm}

Arguments


str_newForm
Desired formulation.
str_oldForm
If this argument is provided, then the components having this
                            formulation will be changed to the new formulation and all others will
                            be left as they are.
Optional.



Returns


Success
The number of components changed.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::solver::ChangeFormulation $NewFormulation
::hwat::solver::ChangeFormulation $NewFormulation $OldFormulation


Comments
If the components are already in the new formulation specifed, then no change is
                made.
This function only operates on the displayed elements. Elements not on the display
                will not be modified.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：solver：：ChangeFormulation
如果
必修的。
语法
：：hwat:：solver：：ChangeFormulation str_newForm｛str_OldForm｝

论据


str_newForm
所需配方。

如果提供了此参数，则具有此参数的组件
配方将更改为新配方，所有其他配方都将
保持原样。
可选择的



退换商品


成功
组件的数量已更改。
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：solver：：ChangeFormulation$NewFormulation
：：hwat:：solver：：ChangeFormulation$NewFormulation$OldFormulation


评论
如果成分已经在指定的新配方中，则没有变化
…制造的
此功能仅对显示的元素起作用。不在显示器上的元素
不会被修改。

doc_content:
::hwat::solver::CreateDummyPositionArray
Scans the model and creates arrays that are required by the dummy positioning
        APIs.
Syntax
::hwat::solver::CreateDummyPositionArray

Returns


Success
A Tcl list containing two lists. Both lists are in the form returned by
                            the array Get command. The first list maps parent and
                            child system IDs to property IDs. The second list maps child system IDs
                            to the child component IDs. These lists are required by the APIs used
                            for dummy positioning.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::solver::CreateDummyPositionArray

Comments
This function needs to be called at least once after a dummy is imported.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：解算器：：CreateDummyPositionArray
扫描模型并创建虚拟定位所需的阵列
API。
语法
：：hwat:：解算器：：CreateDummyPositionArray

退换商品


成功
包含两个列表的Tcl列表。两个列表的格式都由返回
数组Get命令。第一个列表映射父对象和
子系统ID到属性ID。第二个列表映射子系统ID
到子组件ID。这些列表是所使用的API所必需的
用于假人定位。
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：解算器：：CreateDummyPositionArray

评论
导入伪对象后，此函数需要至少调用一次。

        assembly with the same name given in the list.

推断组件ScanDynaParts列表_of_assembly

::hwat::utils::BoundingBox
This function calculates the bounding box around the given list of components or
        elements and returns the dimensions of the bounding box.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::BoundingBox assemName option (components or shells)

Arguments


assemName
The HWAT assembly name.
option
One of the following:
components
Uses the HyperMesh internal
                                        function which is faster.
shells
Calculates the bounds considering only the shell elements in
                                        the assembly.
Default = components.





Returns


Success
A list of the form {MinX MinY MinZ MaxX MaxY MaxZ}
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::BoundingBox "Vehicle" "components"

Comments
The shells option may be useful to ignore mass or solid elements that may cause the
                calculation to return an undesirable result.

此函数计算给定零部件列表周围的边界框，或
元素，并返回边界框的尺寸。

选项
以下其中一项：
组件

功能更快。
贝壳
仅考虑中的shell元素来计算边界
组件。
默认值=组件。





退换商品


成功

失败
{}



实例

评论
如果忽略可能导致
计算以返回不希望的结果。

                    maximum

::hwat::utils::ConvertUnits
Converts units from one format to another.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::ConvertUnits:: units_in units_out {base_value 1}

Arguments


Units_in
A string that describes the units you want to convert from. 
Units_out
A string that describes the units you want to convert to.
base_value
Value of the "from" to convert to the "to".
Optional.



Returns


Success
The conversion value to multiply the “in” values by to get the “out”
                            value.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ConvertUnits “4 mph” “mm\/ms”

Comments
Be sure to escape any forward slashes with a preceding backslash. 
Not passing a base_value is the same as passing 1 for the
                    base_value.

一个字符串，用于描述要转换的单位。
单元_输出
描述要转换为的单位的字符串。
基本值（_V）
要转换为“to”的“from”的值。
可选择的



退换商品


成功
将“in”值乘以以获得“out”的转换值
价值
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ConvertUnits“4 mph”“mm\/ms”

评论
请确保用前面的反斜杠转义任何正斜杠。
不传递base_value与为
base_value。

::hwat::utils::CreateFrontPole
Creates a rigid pole for frontal collision.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateFrontPole name template jNode jHeightVehicle gap diameter
                    height [offset] [assemName]

Arguments


name
The name of the rigid pole.
template
The location of the template file.
jnode
The ID of the JNode.
jHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
gap
The gap between the barrier and the vehicle.
diameter
The diameter of the rigid pole.
height
The height of the rigid pole.
offset
The percent offset from the center of the vehicle.
Default = 0.
For example: 20 means that the barrier is offset to the right of the
                            center line by 20% of the vehicle's width.
assemName
The name of the HWAT vehicle assembly.
Default = Vehicle.



Returns


Success
The ID of the pole.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateFrontPole "Pole" "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" 42758 100.0 10 250 600 -20 "Vehicle"

Comments
The HWAT vehicle assembly is slaved to the rigid pole.
translated_doc_content:

为正面碰撞创建刚性极点。

高度[偏移量][资产名称]

名称
刚性杆的名称。
样板
模板文件的位置。
jnode
JNode的ID。
jHeightVehicle
车辆的真实J高度。
缺口
障碍物和车辆之间的间隙。
直径
刚性杆的直径。
身高
刚性杆的高度。
抵消
偏离车辆中心的百分比。
默认值为0。
例如：20表示屏障偏移到
中心线乘以车辆宽度的20%。
assemName
HWAT车辆总成的名称。
默认值=车辆。



退换商品


成功
杆的ID。
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateFrontPole“Pole”“D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key”42758 100.0 10 250 600-20“车辆”

评论
HWAT车辆总成从属于刚性杆。

::hwat::utils::CreateMark
This function clears the mark and creates a mark on the desired entities.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateMark entityType mark args

Arguments


entityType
The type of the entity.
mark
The ID of the mark.
args
The arguments after the mark argument in the
                                *createmark command.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateMark "components"  1 "by sets" Vehicle .

Comments
If any one of the args is a list in Tcl like [list 1 2 3] or {1 2
                3} or a variable which is a list, use eval before the
                    ::hwat::utils::CreateMark command. Also, in these cases,
                while using the options like by assems or on plane
                pass them as \"assems\" or \"on plane\"
                respectively.
For example: set a { 1 2 3}
                eval ::hwat::utils::CreateMark comps 1 \"by assems\" $a
However, if the values 1, 2 and 3 are not in a
                list::hwat::utils::CreateMark comps 1 "by assems" 1 2 3
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark
此功能可清除标记并在所需实体上创建标记。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark entityType标记参数

论据


实体类型
实体的类型。
做记号
标记的ID。
args
中标记参数之后的参数
*createmark命令。



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark“components”1“by sets”Vehicle。

评论
如果任何一个参数是Tcl中的列表，如[list 1 2 3]或{1 2
3} 或者是一个列表变量，在
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark命令。而且在这些情况下，
使用assems或在飞机上等选项时
将它们作为“assems”或“在飞机上”传递
分别地
例如：设置一个｛1 2 3｝
eval:：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark comps 1\“by assems\”$a
但是，如果值1、2和3不在
list:：hwat:：utils:：CreateMark comps 1“by assems”1 2 3

Creates an outputblock.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateOutputblock str_baseName n_entityList str_template
                    {str_entityType node}

Arguments


str_baseName
Name to use for the outputblock. Should be unique.
n_entityList
List of entities to put into the outputblock.
str_template
Solver template (needed for the CreateCollector
                            command).
str_entityType
Type of entity that the outputblock will hold (default = node).
Optional.



Returns


Success
Outputblock ID
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateOutputblock ralph [list 1 3 5 7 9] c:/altair/hw6.1x5/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key

Comments
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateOutputblock
创建输出块。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateOutputblock str_baseName n_entityList str_template
｛str_entityType节点｝

论据


str_baseName
用于输出块的名称。应该是唯一的。
_实体列表
要放入输出块的实体列表。
str_template
解算器模板（CreateCollector需要
命令
str_entityType
输出块将保存的实体的类型（默认值=节点）。
可选择的



退换商品


成功
输出块ID
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateOutputblock ralph[list 1 3 5 7 9]c:/altair/hw6.1x5/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key

评论

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateRigidWallBarrier
Creates a Rigid Wall barrier, both flat or angled.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateRigidWallBarrier barrierName gap JNode JHeightVehicle
                    friction location angle numOfWalls {wallDims} assemName bcicType

Arguments


barrierName
Name to give the barrier. Finite barriers will be named barriername.0,
                            barriername.1, etc.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
JHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
friction
The contact friction.
location
The location of the template file.
angle
The angle of the wall about the global z-axis.
Default = 0.0.
numOfWalls
The number of walls in the barrier. If 0, then an infinite barrier is
                            created.
Default = 0.
wallDims
A Tcl list of lists defining the position and dimensions of the walls.
                            If the numOfWalls is greater than 0, this argument is
                            a must. Each list should be of the form relative Y base point, relative
                            Z base point, Y dimension, Z dimension
Default = ""
For example, if the number of walls is 6:
[list [list 0.0 0.0 30.0 30.0] [list 30.0 0.0 30.0 30.0] [list 60.0 0.0
                            30.0 30.0] [list 0.0 30.0 30.0 30.0] [list 30.0 30.0 30.0 30.0] [list
                            60.0 30.0 30.0 30.0] ] 
assemName
The name of the HWAT vehicle assembly.
Default = Vehicle.
bcicType
The BCIC type.
Default = FRONT. 
Only FRONT is currently supported.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateRigidWallBarrier HWATFrontRW 10.0 1003 100.0 1.2 "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" 45.0 0

Comments
Implements RIGIDWALL algorithm. This function slaves the assembly to the rigid
                wall.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateRigidWallBarrier
创建刚性墙障碍，包括平面障碍或倾斜障碍。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateRigidWallBarrierName gap JNode JHeightVehicle
摩擦位置角numOfWalls｛wallDims｝assemName bcicType

论据


barrierName
指定屏障的名称。有限屏障将被命名为barriername.0，
barriername.1等。
缺口
障碍物与车辆之间的距离。
J节点
JNode的ID。
JHeightVehicle
车辆的真实J高度。
摩擦
接触摩擦。
地方
模板文件的位置。
角
墙围绕全局z轴的角度。
默认值为0.0。
numOfWalls
屏障中墙的数量。如果为0，则无限屏障为
创建。
默认值为0。
wallDims
定义墙的位置和尺寸的列表的Tcl列表。
如果numOfWalls大于0，则此参数为
这是必须的。每个列表的形式应该是相对Y基点，相对
Z基点、Y尺寸、Z尺寸
违约
例如，如果墙的数量为6：
[list[list 0.0 30.0 30.0][list 30.0 0.0 30.0][list 60.0 0.0
30.0 30.0][列表0.0 30.0 30.0 30.0][列表30.0 30.030.0][列表
60.0 30.0 30.0 30.0] ]
assemName
HWAT车辆总成的名称。
默认值=车辆。
bcicType
BCIC类型。
默认设置为FRONT。
当前仅支持FRONT。



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:CreateRigidWallBarrier HWATFrontRW 10.0 1003 100.0 1.2“D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key”45.0 0

评论
实现RIGIDWALL算法。此功能将装配从属于刚性
墙

::hwat::utils::CreateRoad
Creates a road in HWAT.

barrierName

gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
JHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
friction
The contact friction.
location
The location of the template file.
angle
The angle of the wall about the global z-axis.
Default = 0.0.
numOfWalls
The number of walls in the barrier. If 0, then an infinite barrier is
                            created.
Default = 0.
wallDims
A Tcl list of lists defining the position and dimensions of the walls.
                            If the numOfWalls is greater than 0, this argument is

                            Z base point, Y dimension, Z dimension
Default = ""
For example, if the number of walls is 6:
[list [list 0.0 0.0 30.0 30.0] [list 30.0 0.0 30.0 30.0] [list 60.0 0.0

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateSidePole
Creates a rigid pole for side impact.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateSidePole name template jNode jHeightVehicle assemName
                    dummyHeadCGnode gap diameter height

Arguments


name
The name of the rigid pole.
template
The location of the template file.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
JHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
assemName
The name of the HWAT door assembly.
dummyHeadCGnode
The ID of the dummy head CG node.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
diameter

The diameter of the rigid pole.

height

The height of the rigid pole.




Returns


Success
The ID of the pole
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateSidePole "Pole" "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" 42758 100.0 "DOOR" 10122 10 250 600.

Comments
The HWAT door assembly is slaved to the rigid pole.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSidePole
为侧面碰撞创建刚性杆。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSidePole名称模板jNode jHeightVehicle assemName
dummyHeadC节点间隙直径高度

论据


名称
刚性杆的名称。
样板
模板文件的位置。
J节点
JNode的ID。
JHeightVehicle
车辆的真实J高度。
assemName
HWAT门部件的名称。
dummyHeadCGnode
伪头CG节点的ID。
缺口
障碍物与车辆之间的距离。
直径

刚性杆的直径。

身高

刚性杆的高度。




退换商品


成功
杆的ID
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSidePole“Pole”“D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key”42758 100.0“DOOR”10122 10 250 600。

评论
HWAT门总成从属于刚性杆。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateSectionCut
Creates a finite or an infinite section cut.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateSectionCut assemname sectionName template {startpnt}
                    {endpnt}} distance type {xlocation} xmin ymin xmax ymax

Arguments


assemname
Name of the assembly on which to create the section.
sectionName
Name to give the newly created group in HyperMesh.
template
The location of the template file.
startpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tail node of the normal
                            vector.
endpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tip node of the normal
                            vector.
distance
The distance from the tail node to the base point. Can be a percentage
                            distance between the start and end points. 
type
Finite or Infinite 
Default: infinite
xlocation
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the node used to determine the
                            local x axis (Finite section cuts only).
xmin
The minimum value of the local X axis (usually negative).
ymin
The minimum value of the local Y axis (usually negative).
xmax
The maximum value of the local X axis (usually positive).
ymax
The maximum value of the local Y axis (usually positive).



Returns


Success
ID of the section cut
Failure
{}



Example
CreateSectionCut MIDRAIL_L "SECTION1" "D:/Altair/feoutput/templates/ls-dyna/dyna.key."  [list 0.0 0.0 0.0] [list 0.0 0.0 1.0] 50% finite [list 0.0 1.0 0.0] -200.0 -100.0 200.0 100.0.

Comments
xlocation, xmin, ymin, xmax, and ymax are needed only for the finite section cut.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSectionCut
创建有限或无限截面剪切。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSectionCut assemname sectionName模板｛startpnt｝
{endnt}}距离类型{xlocation}xmin-ymin-xmax-ymax

论据


组件名称
要在其上创建节的程序集的名称。
sectionName
在HyperMesh中为新创建的组命名。
样板
模板文件的位置。
startpnt
法线尾部节点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表
矢量。
endnt
法线尖端节点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表
矢量。
距离
从尾部节点到基点的距离。可以是百分比
起点和终点之间的距离。
类型
有限或无限
默认值：无限
xlocation
用于确定的节点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表
局部x轴（仅限有限截面切割）。
xmin
局部X轴的最小值（通常为负值）。
ymin
局部Y轴的最小值（通常为负值）。
xmax
局部X轴的最大值（通常为正）。
ymax
局部Y轴的最大值（通常为正）。



退换商品


成功
截面切割的ID
失败
{}



实例
CreateSectionCut MIDRAIL_L“SECTION1”“D:/Altair/feoutput/templates/ls dyna/dyna.key.”[list 0.0 0.0 0.0][list 0.0 0.0 1.0]50%有限[list 0.0 1.0 0.0]-200.0-100.0 200.0 100.0。

评论
xlocation、xmin、ymin、xmax和ymax仅用于有限截面切割。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateSystem
Creates a new coordinate system, assigns it to a parent.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateSystem n_nodeList n_type d_originXYZ d_xAxisXYZ
                    d_yAxisXYZ [n_parentSysID] [str_collectorName]

Arguments


n_nodeList
A Tcl list of node IDs on which to create the system.
n_type
The type of the system
0
rectangular
1
cylindrical
2
spherical


d_originXYZ
A Tcl list containing the x, y and z coordinates of the origin.
d_xAxisXYZ
A Tcl list containing the x, y, and z coordinates of a point on the
                            x-axis.
d_yAxisXYZ
A Tcl list containing the x, y, and z coordinates of a point on the
                            y-axis.
n_parentSysID
Parent system ID.
Default = 0
str_collectorName
Name of the system collector into which the new system will be
                            stored.
Default = 0



Returns


Success
ID of the system created
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils:: CreateSystem {100 101 102 103} 0 {0 0 0} {0 01} {0 1 0}

Comments
If the str_collectorName already exists, the new system is placed
                there. Otherwise, the collector is created automatically.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSystem
创建一个新的坐标系，并将其指定给父坐标系。
语法
：：hwat：：utils：：CreateSystem n_nodeList n_type d_originalXYZ d_xAxisXYZ
d_yAxisXYZ[nparentSysID][str_collectorName]

论据


n_nodeList
要在其上创建系统的节点ID的Tcl列表。
n_type
系统的类型
0
矩形的
1.
圆柱形的
2.
球形的


d_originalXYZ
包含原点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表。
d_x轴XYZ
Tcl列表，包含上的点的x、y和z坐标
x轴。
d_Y轴XYZ
Tcl列表，包含上的点的x、y和z坐标
y轴。
n_parentSysID
父系统ID。
默认值=0
str_collector名称
新系统将要加入的系统收集器的名称
存储。
默认值=0



退换商品


成功
创建的系统的ID
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateSystem｛100 101 102 103｝0｛0 0｝｛0 01｝

评论
如果str_collectorName已经存在，则放置新系统
那里否则，收集器将自动创建。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateTag
Creates a tag in HyperMesh.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateTag entityType n_entIDorLocationList label body
                    [color]

Arguments


entityType
Type of entity to which the tag is attached. Legal values include
                                node or element.
n_entIDorLocationList
ID of the entity to which the tag is to be attached, or location at
                            which node should be created and tag attached to newly created
                            node.
label
Content for the tag label.
body
Content for the tag body.
color

The color for the tag. 
Default = 1




Returns


Success
ID of the newly created tag
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateTag node {99} “Node1” “Strike Node”
::hwat::utils::CreateTag node {101 203 405} “Node2” “Strike Node”

Comments
If n_entIDorLocationList has 3 members AND
                    entityType = node, a new node will be
                created at the given location and the tag will attached to that new node.
For all other cases, the first member of the n_entIDorLocationList
                will be treated as the entity ID and the tag will be attached accordingly. If no
                such entity exists, no tag is created and {} is returned to the caller.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTag
在HyperMesh中创建标记。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTag entityType n_entIDorLocationList标签体
颜色

论据


实体类型
标记附着到的实体的类型。法律价值包括
节点或元素。
n_entID或位置列表
标记要附着到的实体的ID，或位于的位置
应该创建哪个节点并将标签附加到新创建的节点
节点。
标签
标记标签的内容。
</body>
标记正文的内容。
颜色

标记的颜色。
默认值=1




退换商品


成功
新建标记的ID
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTag节点｛99｝“Node1”“Strike节点”
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTag节点｛101 203 405｝“Node2”“Strike node”

评论
如果n_entIDorLocationList有3个成员AND
entityType=节点，新节点将是
在给定位置创建，并且标签将附加到该新节点。
对于所有其他情况，n_entIDorLocationList的第一个成员
将被视为实体ID，并相应地附加标签。如果没有
这样的实体存在，不创建任何标记，并且将｛｝返回给调用者。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateTempNode
Creates a temporary node at given location(s).
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateTempNode {locations}

Arguments


locations
Tcl list of x, y and z coordinates of the nodes to be created. The list
                            must be an integral of 3.



Returns


Success
A list of IDs of the created nodes
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateTempNode [list 0.0 0.0 0.0 1.0 2.0 3.0 6.5 7.6 8.7]

Comments
Can create 1 or many nodes. Lists that are not integral of 3 will result in an error
                and no temps will be created.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTempNode
在给定位置创建临时节点。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTempNode｛locations｝

论据


位置
要创建的节点的x、y和z坐标的Tcl列表。列表
必须是3的整数。



退换商品


成功
已创建节点的ID列表
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTempNode[列表0.0 0.0 1.0 2.0 3.0 6.5 7.6 8.7]

评论
可以创建一个或多个节点。不是3的整数的列表将导致错误
并且将不创建temp。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::CreateTitle
Creates a title for given entity in HyperMesh.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::CreateTitle str_titleName str_entityType n_entityID
                    str_txtBuffer

Arguments


str_titleName
Name of the title to be created.
str_entityType

Type of entity to attach title to. Legal values include:
Undefined
Node
Element
Load
System



n_entityID
ID of the entity to which the title is to be attached. Can be "0" for
                            "undefined".
str_txtBuffer
Title text that will be set to the newly created title.



Returns


Success
ID of the title created
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::CreateTitle MyTitle node 567 "This is some text"

Comments
Before creating the title, a check is made to see if the title exists. If it does,
                the function errors out and returns {}.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTitle
为HyperMesh中的给定实体创建标题。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTitle str_titleName str_entityType n_entityID
str_txtBuffer

论据


str_titleName
要创建的标题的名称。
str_entityType

要附加所有权的实体类型。法律价值包括：
未定义
节点
元素
负载
系统



_实体ID
要附加标题的实体的ID。可以是的“0”
“未定义”。
str_txtBuffer
将设置为新创建的标题的标题文本。



退换商品


成功
创建的标题的ID
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：CreateTitle MyTitle节点567“这是一些文本”

评论
在创建标题之前，将检查标题是否存在。如果是，
函数出错并返回｛｝。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::DeleteFESession
Clears the entire HyperMesh session of all data. 
Syntax
::hwat::utils::DeleteFESession {str_namespaceList}

Arguments


str_namespaceList
If provided a list of Tcl namespaces, those will be cleared as
                            well.
Optional.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::DeleteFESession;
::hwat::utils::DeleteFESession [list nvd hwt];

Comments
Be careful when sending a list of namespaces to delete. Some may not be easily
                reloaded.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：DeleteFESession
清除整个HyperMesh会话中的所有数据。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：DeleteFESession｛str_namespaceList｝

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity
Finds the list of attached entities for a given entity and puts them on mark
        2.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity entityId thisEntityType
                    attachedEntityType [numbers]

Arguments


entityId
A Tcl list of IDs of the entities (same type) or ID of the entity to
                            which to find the attached entities.
thisEntityType
The entity type of above entities or entity.
numbers
1 to display numbers on the found entities, 0 to not display.
Default = 0



Returns


Success
A Tcl list of attached entities to the given entity
Failure
{}



Example
This call should return all the components attached to node 111.
::hwat::utils::FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity  111 nodes components 
This call should return all components attached to the component 111. This list
                should exclude the original component 111 from the
                list.::hwat::utils::FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity  222 components components 1

Comments
Will return 0 if there are no attached entities. If the entity type and the attached
                entity types are the same, and if only one entity ID is given, this ID is removed
                from the list of attached entities.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity
查找给定实体的附着实体列表并将其标记
2.
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntityId thisEntityType
attachedEntityType[numbers]

论据


实体ID
实体（相同类型）的ID或实体的ID的Tcl列表
以找到所附接的实体。
thisEntityType
上述实体或实体的实体类型。
数字
1表示在找到的实体上显示数字，0表示不显示。
默认值=0



退换商品


成功
给定实体的附加实体的Tcl列表
失败
{}



实例
这个调用应该返回所有连接到节点111的组件。
：：hwat:：utils:FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity 111节点组件
这个调用应该返回连接到组件111的所有组件。此列表
应将原始组件111排除在
列表hwat:：utils:FindAttachedEntityToGivenEntity 222组件组件1

评论
如果没有附加实体，将返回0。如果实体类型和附着
实体类型相同，如果只给定一个实体ID，则删除该ID
从附着实体列表中选择。

::hwat::utils::FindNodeOnComponents
Finds if the node belongs to any given component.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::FindNodeOnComponents nodeId {complist}

Arguments


nodeId
The ID of the node to look for.
[Complist]
Tcl list of components to look in. The argument could be
                                all or displayed. 
Default = all



Returns


Success
The ID list of the component(s) containing the node
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::FindNodeOnComponents 128 [list 1000 1001 1002 1003]

Comments
Since a single node can be utilized by many components, the return list may contain
                more than one component. The return may or may not contain all the components sent
                as input.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：FindNodeOnComponents
查找节点是否属于任何给定的组件。

nodeId
要查找的节点的ID。
[编译者]
要查找的组件的Tcl列表。参数可能是
全部或显示。
默认值=全部



退换商品


成功
包含节点的组件的ID列表
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：FindNodeOnComponents 128[列表1000 1001 1002 1003]

评论
由于单个节点可以被许多组件使用，因此返回列表可能包含
不止一个组件。退货可能包含也可能不包含发送的所有组件
作为输入。

的相应根程序集的ID列表的Tcl列表

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity
This function clears the mark, creates a mark on the desired entities, and returns
        the entities on the mark.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity entityType mark args

Arguments


entityType
The type of the entity.
mark
The ID of the mark.
args
The arguments after the mark argument in the
                                *createmark command.



Returns


Success
A Tcl list containing the IDs of the entities, 0 if no entity is
                            found.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity "components"  1 "by sets" Vehicle

Comments
If any one of the arguments is a list in Tcl, like [list 1 2 3] or
                    {1 2 3}, or a variable which is a list, use
                    eval before the
                    ::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity command. Also, in these cases,
                while using options such as by assems or on plane,
                pass them as \"by assems\" or \"on plane\"
                respectively. For example: set a {1 2 3}
                eval ::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity comps 1 \"by assems\" $a
However, if the values 1, 2 and 3 are not in a list:
                ::hwat::utils::GetMarkedEntity comps 1 "by assems" 1 2 3
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：GetMarkedEntity
此函数清除标记，在所需实体上创建标记，然后返回
标记上的实体。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：GetMarkedEntity实体类型标记参数

论据


实体类型
实体的类型。
做记号
标记的ID。
args
中标记参数之后的参数
*createmark命令。



退换商品


成功
包含实体ID的Tcl列表，如果没有实体，则为0
建立
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:GetMarkedEntity“components”1“by sets”Vehicle

评论
如果任何一个参数是Tcl中的列表，如[list 1 2 3]或
｛1 2 3｝，或作为列表的变量，使用
之前的eval
：：hwat:：utils:GetMarkedEntity命令。而且在这些情况下，
当使用诸如通过assems或在飞机上的选项时，
将它们作为“通过assems”或“在飞机上”传递
分别地例如：设置一个｛1 2 3｝
eval:：hwat:：utils:：GetMarkedEntity comps 1\“by assems\”$a
但是，如果值1、2和3不在列表中：
：：hwat:：utils:：GetMarkedEntity comps 1“by assems”1 2 3

::hwat::utils::GetTree
Lists the parent or child systems in a dummy. Should be used to retrieve paths
        without branches. 
Syntax
::hwat::utils::GetTree component hwatassemname option childlist

Arguments


component
The ID of the component to start from (root component).
hwatassemname
The HWAT assembly name for the dummy. This is required only if the next
                            argument is "out" 
Default = ""
option
In or out. in finds
                            the path from the component to the H-Point. out goes in
                            the opposite direction.
Default = in

childlist
A Tcl list of lists of the form compatible with the array set command.
                            This array should map a system to all its children systems. 
Default = ""
For example: {12000 {12001 12002} 12001 {12003} 12002 {12004
                                12005}} 



Returns


Success
A Tcl list of systems.
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::GetTree 102 "FATSID"  "out"
translated_doc_content:

列出虚拟系统中的父系统或子系统。应用于检索路径
没有分支。

论据


组成部分
要启动的组件（根组件）的ID。
hwatassemname
伪对象的HWAT程序集名称。只有当下一个
论点是“out”
违约
选项
入或出。在发现中
从零部件到H点的路径。出去进去
相反的方向。
默认值=在

子列表
与数组集命令兼容的形式的列表的Tcl列表。
此数组应将一个系统映射到其所有子系统。
违约
例如：｛12000｛12001 12002｝12001｛12003｝12002｛12004
12005}}



退换商品


成功
Tcl系统列表。
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：GetTree 102“FATSID”“out”

Returns

A unique name for the entity type of the form "HWATentityTypeIndex",
                            where the index is incremented until a unique name is found. For
                            example, HWATGroups1 or of the type "nameIndex" if the "name" passed is

Creates a duplicate copy of each resulting HyperMesh
        assembly as a component entity set (VCL assembly). These VCL assemblies will contain all
        components from the HyperMesh assembly that had a *PART card
        loaded/defined.

Failure

HyperMesh部件中具有*PART卡的组件
加载/定义。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier
Imports and positions the offset barrier for frontal crash.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier URL translator n_overwrite
                    barriername gap jnode jheight d_value [groundToBarrierDistance] [vehiclename]
                    [flag] [offsets]

Arguments


URL
The path (URL) to the barrier.
translator
The path to the import translator.
n_overwrite
1 = overwrite entities (default)
0 = no overwrite
barriername
The name of the barrier.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
jheight
The true J height of the vehicle.
Default = 0.0.
JHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
d_value
The value for the overlap or offset option.
d_groundToBarrierDistance
The distance from the ground to the base of the barrier.
Default = 200.0
Optional.
vehiclename
The name of the vehicle assembly.
Default = VEHICLE
Optional.
[str_flag]
Either "offset" or "overlap"
Overlap
0 has no useful meaning since the barrier and vehicle would
                                        not impact each other. 
-10 means that the barrier will overlap the left side of the
                                        vehicle by 10% of the vehicle's width.
20 means that the barrier will overlap the right side of the
                                        vehicle by 20% of the vehicle's width.
Offset
0% means that the barrier and vehicle center lines line up. 
-10% means that the barrier is offset to the left by 10% of
                                        the vehicle's width. 
20% means that the barrier is offset to the right by 20% of
                                        the vehicle's width.


Default = offset
Optional.
offsets
The offsets to apply when importing the barrier. 
Default = {}}
For example {components 1000 assems 22}







Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier "D:/Hwat/barriers/208barrier.key" "D:/Altair/hm/bin/feinput/dynakey.exe"  "HWATBarrier" 10 9882 100 –40 250.0 "MODEL1" overlap.

Comments
Implements the OFFSET algorithm.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier
导入并定位正面碰撞的偏移屏障。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier URL转换器n_overwrite
障碍物名称间隙jnode jheight d_value[地面到障碍物距离][车辆名称]
[flag][offsets]

论据


统一资源定位地址
屏障的路径（URL）。
翻译
导入转换器的路径。
覆盖（_O）
1=覆盖实体（默认）
0=不覆盖
barriername
屏障的名称。
缺口
障碍物与车辆之间的距离。
J节点
JNode的ID。
j高度
车辆的真实J高度。
默认值为0.0。
JHeightVehicle
车辆的真实J高度。
d_value
重叠或偏移选项的值。
d_ground到障碍物的距离
从地面到屏障底部的距离。
默认值=200.0
可选择的
车辆名称
车辆总成的名称。
默认值=车辆
可选择的
[str_flag]
“偏移”或“重叠”
重叠
0没有任何有用的意义，因为障碍物和车辆会
不会相互影响。
-10表示屏障将与的左侧重叠
车辆宽度的10%。
20表示屏障将与的右侧重叠
车辆宽度的20%。
抵消
0%表示障碍物和车辆中心线对齐。
-10%表示屏障向左偏移10%
车辆宽度。
20%表示障碍向右偏移20%
车辆宽度。


默认值=偏移
可选择的
偏移
导入障碍时要应用的偏移。
违约
例如｛components 1000 assems 22｝







退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionOffsetBarrier“D:/hwat/barriers/208barrier.key”“D:/Altair/hm/bin/feinput/dynkey.exe”“HWATBarrier”10 9882 100–40 250.0“MODEL1”重叠。

评论
实现OFFSET算法。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionPendulums
Imports and positions the pendulums for 581 bumper testing.
Syntax
ImportAndPositionPendulums URL translator barriername gap barrierNode zBeam
                    overlap [centerline] [type] [vehiclename] [position] [displacement] [angle]
                    [reflect] [offsets].

Arguments


URL
The path (URL) to the barrier.
translator
The path to the import translator.
barriername
The name of the barrier.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
zbeam
The max z of the bumper beam for high centerline or the min z of the
                            bumper beam for low centerline. 
overlap
The z overlap for the high and low centerline. 
centerline

Either "high" or "low"

Default = "high"

type
Either "center", "outboard", or
                                "corner"

"center"
Will be placed at the mid Y of the bumper.
"outboard"
Will be displaced from the mid Y of the bumper by a
                                        specified distance. 
"corner"
Will be placed at the corner at a specified angle. 


Default = "center".
vehiclename
The name of the vehicle assembly.
Default = VEHICLE
Optional.
position
Either front or rear.
Default = front
displacement
The displacement of the pendulum from the mid Y of the bumper. Required
                            if the type is "outboard". Negative means displaced to the left .
Default = 304.8
angle
The angle in degrees from the x-axis. Required if the type is
                            corner.
Default = 0.0
reflect
Reflect the barrier about the x-axis. Either 0 or 1.
Default = 0
offsets
The offsets to apply when importing the barrier. 
Default = {}
For example: {components 1000 assems 22}.
Optional.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionPendulums "D:/Hwat/barriers/pendulum.key" "D:/Altair/hm/bin/feinput/dynakey.exe"  "HWATBarrier" 10 12345 665.5 110 high outboard  "VEHICLE" front 304.8 0.0 1.

Comments
This function assumes that the model has been imported.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionPendulums
进口并定位用于581保险杠测试的摆锤。
语法
ImportAndPositionPendulums URL翻译器barriername gap barrierNode zBeam
重叠[中心线][类型][车辆名称][位置][位移][角度]
[反射][偏移]。

论据


统一资源定位地址
屏障的路径（URL）。
翻译
导入转换器的路径。
barriername
屏障的名称。
缺口
障碍物与车辆之间的距离。
zbeam
高中心线保险杠梁的最大z或的最小z
用于低中心线的保险杠横梁。
重叠
高和低中心线的z重叠。
中心线

“高”或“低”

默认值=“高”

类型
“中心”、“外侧”或
角

居中
将被放置在保险杠的Y轴中部。
“舷外”
将从保险杠的中间Y偏移一个
指定的距离。
角
将以指定角度放置在拐角处。


默认值为“center”。
车辆名称
车辆总成的名称。
默认值=车辆
可选择的
位置
前部或后部。
默认值=前部
取代
摆锤从保险杠中间Y的位移。要求的
如果类型为“舷外”。负值表示向左移位。
默认值=304.8
角
与x轴的角度（以度为单位）。如果类型为，则为必需
角
默认值=0.0
反映
围绕x轴反射屏障。0或1。
默认值=0
偏移
导入障碍时要应用的偏移。
违约
例如：｛components 1000 assems 22｝。
可选择的



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionPendulums“D:/hwat/bbarriers/pulum.key”“D:/Altair/hm/bin/feinput/dynkey.exe”“HWATBarrier”10 12345 665.5 110高外侧“VEHICLE”前部304.8 0.0 1。

评论
此函数假定模型已导入。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionRearBarriers
Imports and positions the various rear barriers.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionSideBarriers barrierURL translator barrierName
                    gap jNode kNode jHeightVehicle kHeightVehicle groundToBarrierDistance algorithm
                    [value] [flag] [angle] [strikeNodeId] [strikerNodeId [vehicleAssem]
                    [offsetsList].

Arguments


barrierURL
The path (URL) to the barrier.
translator
The path to the import translator.
barrierName
Name to give the barrier. Finite barriers will be named barriername.0,
                            barriername.1, etc.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
kNode
The ID of the K Node.
JHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
kHeightVehicle
The true K height of the vehicle.
groundToBarrierDistance
The distance from the ground to the base of the barrier.
algorithm
Either REAR or OBLIQUE.
value
The value for the overlap or offset option required for REAR.
Default = ""
flag
Either "offset" or "overlap"; required
                            for REAR. 
Overlap
0 has no useful meaning since the barrier and vehicle would
                                        not impact each other. 
-10 means that the barrier will overlap the left side of the
                                        vehicle by 10% of the vehicle's width.
20 means that the barrier will overlap the right side of the
                                        vehicle by 20% of the vehicle's width.
Offset
0% means that the barrier and vehicle center lines line up. 
-10% means that the barrier is offset to the left by 10% of
                                        the vehicle's width. 
20% means that the barrier is offset to the right by 20% of
                                        the vehicle's width.


Default = "" 
angle
The angle to rotate the barrier.
Default = ""
strikeNodeId
The ID of the strike node.
Default = ""
strikerNodeId

The ID of the striker node.

Default = ""
vehicleAssem
The name of the vehicle assembly. 
Default = VEHICLE.
offsetsList
The offsets to apply when importing the barrier.
Default = {}
For example, {components 1000 assems 22}



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionRearBarriers "D:/TestModels/Barriers/Rear.dyn" "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" "BARRIER" 10 6567 8790 100 150 200.0 REAR -20 offset {} {} {} "VEHICLE".

Comments
This function assumes that the vehicle model has been imported.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionRearBarriers
进口和定位各种后挡板。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionSideBarriers屏障URL转换器屏障名称
gap jNode kNode jHeightVehicle kHeightVehicle groundToBarrierDistance算法
[value][flag][angle][strikeNodeId][strikerNodeId[vehicleAssem]
[offsetsList]。

论据


barrierURL
屏障的路径（URL）。
翻译
导入转换器的路径。
barrierName
指定屏障的名称。有限屏障将被命名为barriername.0，
barriername.1等。
缺口
障碍物与车辆之间的距离。
J节点
JNode的ID。
k节点
K节点的ID。
JHeightVehicle
车辆的真实J高度。
k高度车辆
车辆的真实K高度。
地面到障碍物的距离
从地面到屏障底部的距离。
算法
后部或倾斜。
价值
REAR所需的重叠或偏移选项的值。
违约
旗帜
“偏移”或“重叠”；必修的
用于后部。
重叠
0没有任何有用的意义，因为障碍物和车辆会
不会相互影响。
-10表示屏障将与的左侧重叠
车辆宽度的10%。
20表示屏障将与的右侧重叠
车辆宽度的20%。
抵消
0%表示障碍物和车辆中心线对齐。
-10%表示屏障向左偏移10%
车辆宽度。
20%表示障碍向右偏移20%
车辆宽度。


违约
角
旋转屏障的角度。
违约
strikeNodeId
罢工节点的ID。
违约
strikerNodeId

前锋节点的ID。

违约
车辆资产
车辆总成的名称。
默认值=VEHICLE。
offsetsList
导入障碍时要应用的偏移。
违约
例如，{components 1000 assems 22}



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ImportAndPositionRearBarriers“D:/TestModels/Barriers/Rear.dyn”“D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key”“BARRIER”10 6567 8790 100 150 200.0 Rear-20偏移量｛｝｛}｛｝｝“VEHICLE”。

评论
此函数假定已导入车辆模型。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionSideBarriers
Imports and positions the various side barriers.
Syntax
ImportAndPositionSideBarriers barrierURL translator barrierName gap jNode
                    kNode jHeightVehicle kHeightVehicle groundToBarrierDistance algorithm
                    [frontAxleX] [rearAxleX] [leadingEdgeNode] [rPointId] [pitch] [vehicleAssem]
                    [offsetsList]

Arguments


BarrierURL
The path (URL) to the barrier.
translator
The path to the import translator.
barrierName
The name of the barrier.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
kNode
The ID of the K Node.
jHeightVehicle
The true J height of the vehicle.
kHeightVehicle
The true K height of the vehicle.
groundToBarrierDistance
The distance from the ground to the base of the barrier.
algorithm
Either FMVSS214 or EURO or
                                IIHS.
frontAxleX
The x coordinate of the front axle required for FMVSS214 and IIHS 
Default = ""
rearAxleX
The x coordinate of the rear axle required for FMVSS214 and IIHS.
Default = ""
leadingEdgeNode
The ID of the barrier leading edge node. Needed for FMVSS214 and
                            IIHS.
Default = ""
rPointId
The ID of the SgRPx node required for EURO.
Default = ""
pitch
Flag for pitch.
1 -> apply pitch 
0 -> don't apply 
Default = 0
vehicleAssem
The name of the vehicle assembly.
Default = VEHICLE
offsetsList
The offsets to apply when importing the barrier. 
Default = {}
For example, {components 1000 assems 22}



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionSideBarriers "D:/TestModels/Barriers/Side.dyn" "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" "BARRIER" 10 6567 8790 100 150 200.0 IIHS 1618 4514 444611 {} 1 "VEHICLE".

Comments
This function assumes that the vehicle model has been imported.

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionWallBarriers
 Imports and positions the wall barriers for 581 bumper testing.
Syntax
ImportAndPositionWallBarriers URL translator barriername gap [jnode] [jheight]
                    [vehiclename] [position] [angle] [scale] [offsets].

Arguments


URL
The path (URL) to the barrier.
translator
The path to the import translator.
barriername
The name of the barrier.
gap
The distance between the barrier and the vehicle.
JNode
The ID of the JNode.
jheight
The true J height of the vehicle.
Default = 0.0.
vehiclename
The name of the vehicle assembly.
Default = VEHICLE
Optional.
position
Either front or rear.
Default = front.
angle
The angle in degrees from the x-axis.
Default = 0.0
scale


1
Scale in y and z direction
2
Scale in z direction


Default = 0, no scaling
offsets
The offsets to apply when importing the barrier.
Default = {}
For example, {components 1000 assems 22}
Optional.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::ImportAndPositionWallBarriers "D:/Hwat/barriers/barrier.key" "D:/Altair/hm/bin/feinput/dynakey.exe"  "HWATBarrier" 10 0 0.0 "VEHICLE" front 30.0 0.

Comments
This function assumes that the vehicle model has been imported.

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::PadBBox
Pads the bounding box with the given values.
Syntax
PadBBox {BboxDims} Mode PminX PminY PminZ PmaxX PmaxY PmaxZ

Arguments


BboxDims
Tcl list of the form MinX MinY MinZ MaxX MaxY MaxZ for the bounding
                            box.
Mode


u
Pad same value to all dimensions (1 argument).
b
Pad same value to both sides of corresponding dimensions (3
                                        arguments).
d
Padding value is specified for each dimension (6
                                        arguments).


PminX
Padding value for MinX.
PminY
Padding value for MinY (not required for "u").
PminZ
Padding value for MinZ (not required for "u").
PmaxX
Padding value for MaxX (not required for "u" and "b").
PmaxY
Padding value for MaxY (not required for "u" and "b").
PmaxZ
Padding value for MaxZ (not required for "u" and "b").



Returns


Success
A Tcl list of the form MinX MinY MinZ MaxX MaxY MaxZ
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::PadBBox [list 1.0 1.0 1.0 10.0 20.0 30.0] "b" 5.0 6.0 –7.0

边界的形式MinX MinY MinZ MaxX MaxY MaxZ的Tcl列表
盒
模式


u
将相同的值填充到所有维度（1个参数）。
b
在相应尺寸的两侧垫上相同的值（3
自变量）。
d
为每个尺寸指定填充值（6
自变量）。


PminX
MinX的填充值。
PminY
MinY的填充值（“u”不需要）。
PminZ
MinZ的填充值（“u”不需要）。
PmaxX
MaxX的填充值（“u”和“b”不需要）。
PmaxY
MaxY的填充值（“u”和“b”不需要）。
PmaxZ
MaxZ的填充值（“u”和“b”不需要）。

{}

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::PenetrationCheck
Translates the nodes or elements along a vector until penetration is caused, and then
        translates in the opposite direction until the penetration is zero (less than
        1e-1).
Syntax
PenetrationCheck {Elemlist} {Nodelist} Xcomp Ycomp Zcomp distance systemid
                    iterations

Arguments


Elemlist
A Tcl list of elements of the master assembly. 
Nodelist
A Tcl list of nodes of the slave assembly.
Xcomp
The x-component of the vector to translate along.
Ycomp
The y-component of the vector to translate along.
Zcomp
The z-component of the vector to translate along.
distance
The distance by which to translate (only for the forward
                            direction).
systemid
The system ID for the elements or nodes to translate.
Default = 0
iterations
The number of iterations in each direction.
Default = 10



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::PenetrationCheck [list 1002 1003 … 2002] [list 101 102 .. 509] 1.0 0.0 0.0 –15 2 5.

Comments
If the system ID is 0, the nodes of the slave assembly are translated.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：穿透检查
沿矢量平移节点或元素，直到产生穿透，然后
沿相反方向平移，直到穿透为零（小于
1e-1）。
语法
穿透检查｛Elemlist｝｛Nodelist｝Xcomp Ycomp Zcomp距离系统
迭代

论据


Elemlist
主程序集元素的Tcl列表。
节点列表
从程序集的节点的Tcl列表。
Xcomp
要沿其平移的矢量的x分量。
Ycomp
要沿其平移的矢量的y分量。
Zcomp
要沿其平移的向量的z分量。
距离
平移的距离（仅适用于前方
方向
系统的
要转换的元素或节点的系统ID。
默认值=0
迭代
每个方向上的迭代次数。
默认值=10



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：穿透检查[列表1002 1003…2002][列表101 102..509]1.0 0.0 0.0–15 2 5。

评论
如果系统ID为0，则将转换从属程序集的节点。

Position the "Out of Position" driver or passenger dummy.
Syntax
PositionOOPDummy node1 node2 node3 node4 vehicleAssem rootSysId headAssem

The name of the vehicle assembly.

The name of the dummy chest assembly.

A Tcl list containing the x,y, and z coordinates of the H point of the
                            dummy.

lowerSplinePlateNode
The ID of the lower spline plate node.
location
The location of the template file.
type
Either driver or passenger.
option
Either 1 or 2

If type is passenger:

doc_content:
::hwat::utils:: ReadTargetLocationCSVFile
Returns the data in a 201 Head Target Location CSV file.
Syntax
::hwat::utils:: ReadTargetLocationCSVFile filenamewithpath

Arguments


filenamewithpath
The name of the CSV file.



Returns


Success
A Tcl list of the form target location, X coordinate, Y coordinate, Z
                            coordinate, minimum horizontal angle, horizontal angle, maximum
                            horizontal angle, minimum vertical angle, vertical angle, maximum
                            vertical angle
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils:: ReadTargetLocationCSVFile "D:/hwatfiles/target.csv"

Comments
Format requirements are:
Each value should be separated by comma ",".
There should be at least 10 values in each line. If fewer values are
                        present, that line is invalid. If more than 10 values are present in a line,
                        the first 10 values are considered and remaining are discarded.
If any line data is invalid, this function skips that line and proceeds with
                        the parsing of the next line.
There should be at least 1 valid data line. Otherwise, function returns
                        {}.
Skips all lines, started with #. These lines are comment lines.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：ReadTargetLocationCSVFile
返回201头目标位置CSV文件中的数据。
语法
：：hwat:：utils:：ReadTargetLocationCSVFile filename with path

论据


带有路径的文件名
CSV文件的名称。



退换商品


成功
表格目标位置、X坐标、Y坐标、Z的Tcl列表
坐标，最小水平角，水平角，最大
水平角、最小垂直角、垂直角、最大
垂直角
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ReadTargetLocationCSVFile“D:/hwatfiles/target.csv”

评论
格式要求为：
每个值都应该用逗号“，”分隔。
每行中至少应有10个值。如果值较少
目前，该行无效。如果一行中存在10个以上的值，
则考虑前10个值，并丢弃剩余值。
如果任何行数据无效，此函数将跳过该行并继续
下一行的解析。
应至少有一条有效的数据线。否则，函数返回
{}.
跳过所有行，以#开头。这些行是注释行。

y-axis

z-axis
z component of the axis about which to reflect the entity. 
origin-x
x-coordinate of the origin of the axis. 
origin-y
y-coordinate of the origin of the axis.

Success
1
Failure
{}



Example

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::Renumber
Tries to renumber the list of IDs of the given entity so that they start with the
        'startid' given as parameter. 
Syntax
Renumber entitytype idlist startid

Arguments


entitytype
The type of the entity.
idlist
A Tcl list of entity IDs to renumber –OR- keyword "ALL" for all IDs of
                            the given entity type.
startid
The minimum allowable value.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::Renumber nodes [list 101 102 … 903]  100.
::hwat::utils::Renumber nodes "ALL" 1.

Comments
Caller should check to see that the numbers are actually within desired range after
                renumbering. In some cases it may not be possible to fit all IDs within some desired
                range. It is always assumed that the numbers are incremented by 1 and that there is
                no offset.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils::重新编号

“startid”作为参数给定。

重新编号实体类型ID列表起始ID

论据


实体类型
实体的类型。
idlist
要重新编号的实体ID的Tcl列表-OR-关键字“ALL”表示的所有ID
给定的实体类型。
startid
最小允许值。



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：重新编号节点[列表101 102…903]100。
：：hwat:：utils:：重新编号节点“ALL”1。

评论
来电者应检查号码是否在之后的所需范围内
重新编号。在某些情况下，可能无法将所有ID都放在所需的范围内
范围总是假设数字增加1，并且存在
没有偏移。

doc_content:
::hwat::utils::ScanAssemblies
Scans a model to find if the assemblies in the passed Tcl list exist in the
        model.
Syntax
::hwat::utils::ScanAssemblies list_of_required_assemblies
                deepScanList

Arguments


list_of_required_assemblies
A list of assembly names and a component list corresponding to each
                            assembly. The function will check if each of these assemblies exists in
                            the model or not.
deepScanList
A Tcl list of assemblies from the previous list that should be inferred
                            using component names and titles, if not found by the L1 and L2
                            search.
Default = ""



Returns
The function returns an interlaced list that conforms to the requirements of the Tcl
                    array set command. The indices of the array are
                    "USER" and "REQ". The value of the
                    USER index into the array contains a list of assemblies that
                were found in the model, but not contained in the
                    "list_of_required_assemblies". The value of
                    REQ is a list of assemblies, from the
                    "list_of_required_assemblies", that were found in the current
                model.

Example
::hwat::utils::ScanAssemblies [list A_PILLAR [list 1001 2001] B_PILLAR [list] Vehicle [list 1500 3245]]

Comments
The REQ list returned may be sub-set of the original
                    "list_of_required_assemblies" if not all assemblies were
                present in the model.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：扫描程序集
扫描模型以查找传递的Tcl列表中的程序集是否存在于
模型
语法
：：hwat:：utils：：扫描程序集列表_of_frequed_assembly
深度扫描列表

论据


必需程序集列表
部件名称列表和对应的零部件列表
装配该函数将检查这些程序集中的每一个是否都存在
模型与否。
深度扫描列表
上一个列表中应推断的程序集的Tcl列表
如果L1和L2没有找到，则使用组件名称和标题
搜索
违约



退换商品
函数返回符合Tcl要求的交错列表
数组集命令。数组的索引为
“USER”和“REQ”。的值
数组中的USER索引包含程序集列表
在模型中找到，但未包含在
“list_of_frequired_assemblys”。的值
REQ是程序集的列表，来自
在当前
模型

实例
：：hwat:：utils:：ScanAssemblys[list A_PILLAR[list 1001 2001]B_PILLAR[list]车辆[list 1500 3245]

评论
返回的REQ列表可能是原始的子集
“list_of_frequed_assemblys”（如果不是所有程序集都是）
存在于模型中。

::hwat::utils::SetJointAngles
Sets the joint angles of the dummy.
Syntax
SetJointAngles {components} {angles} parentChild option

Arguments


components
Tcl list of component IDs.
angles
Tcl list of lists of angles to apply corresponding to the component
                            list.
parentChild
0 rotates child, 1 rotates parent system
Default = 0
option
Absolute or relative
Default = absolute



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::utils::SetJointAngles  [list 101 102] [list [list 45 25 0.0] [13.0 0.0  7.5]] 0 relative.

Comments
The component and angle lists must be of equal length. The parent or child will
                always be rotated around X,Y, and Z, in that order. This function assumes that the
                angles passed will not cause them to be out of bounds after rotation.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：utils:：SetJointAngles
设置虚拟对象的关节角度。
语法
SetJointAngles｛components｝｛angles｝parentChild选项

论据


组件
Tcl组件ID列表。
角
Tcl与组件对应的应用角度列表列表
列表
parentChild
0旋转子系统，1旋转父系统
默认值=0
选项
绝对或相对
默认值=绝对值



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：utils:：SetJointAngles[列表101 102][列表45 25 0.0][13.0 0.0 7.5]]0相对。

评论
零部件列表和角度列表的长度必须相等。父母或子女将
始终按X、Y和Z的顺序旋转。此函数假设
经过的角度不会导致它们在旋转后超出边界。

doc_content:
::hwat::xml::RegisterCallback
Register a callback function for any element event.
Syntax
::hwat::xml::RegisterCallback str_functionName str_event
                    str_elementName

Arguments


str_functionName
Name of the function to call when the element event is triggered.
str_event
The event that you wish the callback to be triggered for. Can be one of
                                "xmlstart", "xmlbody", or
                                "xmlclose".
str_elementName
Element name that this callback applies to.



Returns


Success
1
Failure
{}



Example
::hwat::xml::RegisterCallback ::mystuff::StartCallbackProc xmlstart table

Comments
It is suggested that all needed callbacks be registered before calling the XMLParse
                function.
The user defined callback functions will passed the following arguments (based on
                event type):
Xmlstart -> str_elementName str_attrList
Xmlbody -> str_elementName str_data
Xmlclose -> str_elementName
You must author your callback functions to receive these arguments.
translated_doc_content:
：：hwat:：xml:：RegisterCallback
为任何元素事件注册回调函数。
语法
：：hwat:：xml:：RegisterCallback str_functionName str_event
str_elementName

论据


str_functionName
触发元素事件时要调用的函数的名称。
str_event
您希望为其触发回调的事件。可以是其中之一
“xmlstart”、“xmlbody”或
“\xmlclose”。
str_elementName
此回调应用于的元素名称。



退换商品


成功
1.
失败
{}



实例
：：hwat:：xml:：RegisterCallback:：mystuff:：StartCallbackProc xmlstart表

评论
建议在调用XMLParse之前注册所有需要的回调
作用
用户定义的回调函数将传递以下参数（基于
事件类型）：
Xmlstart->str_elementName str_attrList
Xmlbody->str_elementName str_data
Xmlclose->str_elementName
您必须编写回调函数才能接收这些参数。

                it.
The user can overwrite this function to change the default parser behavior if so
                desired.

doc_content:
::hwat::core::CreateFiniteSectionCut
Creates a finite section cut.
Syntax
CreateFiniteSectionCut assemname sectionName template {startpnt} {endpnt}
                    distance {xlocation} xmin ymin xmax ymax.

Arguments


assemname
Name of the HWAT assembly (HyperMesh
                            component entity set) on which to create the section.
sectionName
Name to give the newly created group in HyperMesh.
template
The template location.
startpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tail node of the normal
                            vector.
endpnt
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the tip node of the normal
                            vector.
distance
The distance from the tail node to the base point. Can be a percentage
                            distance between the start and end points. 
xlocation
Tcl list of x, y, and z coordinates of the node used to determine the
                            local x axis.
xmin
The minimum value of the local X axis (usually negative).
ymin
The minimum value of the local Y axis (usually negative).
xmax
The maximum value of the local X axis (usually positive).
ymax
The maximum value of the local Y axis (usually positive).



Returns


Success
Group ID
Failure
{}



Example
CreateFiniteSectionCut MIDRAIL_L midrail_1 "D:/Altair/templates/feoutput/ls-dyna/dyna.key" [list 0.0 0.0 0.0] [list 0.0 0.0 1.0] 50% [list 0.0 1.0 0.0] –100.0 –200.0 200.0 100.0

Comments

起点和终点之间的距离。

局部x轴。
xmin
局部X轴的最小值（通常为负值）。
ymin
局部Y轴的最小值（通常为负值）。
xmax

doc_content:
H3D Validation Tools
The H3D Validation Tools available in HyperWorks are H3D
        Info and H3D Validate.


H3D Info

Name
h3dInfo.exe

Location
HW installation at
                    <hw_root>/io/result_reader/bin/<platform>/h3dInfo.exe

Description
Prints a brief file summary. The summary contains the following information: the file
                format version, data from the file Information block (file author application,
                original source model data filename, original source result filename, comments), and
                the model entity count info (number of assemblies, parts, elements, nodes, systems,
                â€¦).

Example

h3dInfo [options] [input H3D filename] [output filename]
  options:   -summary,  list number of entites.
             -xml <filename>, writes XML content to named file.

  input H3D filename: (required argument)
  output filename: output appended to filename,
                       when omitted, listing displays on screen.





H3D Validate

Name
h3dValidate.exe

Location
HW installation at
                    <hw_root>/io/result_reader/bin/<platform>/h3dValidate.exe

Description
Prints a validation report of a specified file. The High Level validation means that
                only first level entity validation is done (referenced entity IDs are not
                validated). For example, an FE element must reference nodes - therefore high level
                validation will only check the element ID and ID pool assignment, but not if the
                referenced node IDs are valid.

Example

h3dValidate [option] [input H3D filename]

option: -error, determines the messages based on their severity level

(default)    Displays all error and warning messages
-error       Suppress warning messages

input H3D filename: (required argument) 

All output streams to stdout.
translated_doc_content:
H3D验证工具
HyperWorks中可用的H3D验证工具是H3D
信息和H3D验证。


H3D信息

名称
h3dInfo.exe

地方
硬件安装在
<hw_root>/io/result_reader/bin/<platform>/h3dInfo.exe

描述
打印一个简短的文件摘要。摘要包含以下信息：文件
格式版本、来自文件信息块的数据（文件作者应用程序，
原始源模型数据文件名、原始源结果文件名、注释），以及
模型实体计数信息（组件、零件、元素、节点、系统的数量，
â€¦).

实例

h3dInfo[选项][输入H3D文件名][输出文件名]
选项：-summary，列出实体数。
-xml＜filename＞，将xml内容写入命名文件。

输入H3D文件名：（必需参数）
输出文件名：输出附加到文件名，
如果省略，列表将显示在屏幕上。





H3D验证

名称
h3dValidate.exe

地方
硬件安装在
<hw_root>/io/result_reader/bin/<platform>/h3dValidate.exe

描述
打印指定文件的验证报告。高级验证意味着
只进行一级实体验证（不进行引用的实体ID
验证）。例如，FE元素必须引用节点，因此级别很高
验证将只检查元素ID和ID池分配，但如果
引用的节点ID是有效的。

实例

h3dValidate[选项][输入H3D文件名]

选项：-error，根据消息的严重性级别确定消息

（默认）显示所有错误和警告消息
-error禁止显示警告消息

输入H3D文件名：（必需参数）

所有输出流到stdout。

doc_content:
HyperWorks Verification and Validation Harness
HyperWorks Verification and Validation Harness (HVVH) is a tool that can be
        used to verify and validate HyperWorks products. End users can
        use this tool to quickly evaluate the software quality, performance, reliability,
        scalability, and robustness, and to gain more confidence in HyperWorks products.

The main objectives of HVVH include accelerating a customerâ€™s software procurement
                process, hasten migration from one version of the HyperWorks to another and quickly identifying and resolving
                software issues for customers.
This is an integrated end-to-end solution across pre-processors, solvers,
                post-processors, and manufacturing simulations covering most HyperWorks products.
With a single click, you can look at the dashboard reports to decide on the quality
                and accept the product based on any acceptance criteria. HVVH can also quickly
                identify if there are problems with the HyperWorks
                product suite.

GUI and batch mode
HVVH is available as an end-to-end solution for both GUI and batch mode
                        processes across pre- and post-processing, solvers, and manufacturing
                        solutions for on Windows and Linux.
CAE process flow
Simple CAE process flow is followed and you can use all or part of the
                        module, depending on the requirement at different stages of product
                        development.
Dashboard reporting
HTML reports are published with HyperView Player (HVP) in place activation along with
                        graphical display and validation, this helps end users for quick
                        evaluation.
Session files
Session files can be created from the details entered in the GUI. Session
                        files can be saved, retrieved, appended, and run in batch mode.

HVVH supports following HyperWorks products on Windows
                and Linux:
HyperMesh
HyperCrash
HyperView
HyperGraph
HyperForm
HyperXtrude
Inspire
Radioss
OptiStruct



Figure 1.
translated_doc_content:
HyperWorks验证和确认线束
HyperWorks验证和确认线束（HVVH）是一种可以
用于验证HyperWorks产品。最终用户可以
使用此工具可以快速评估软件的质量、性能、可靠性，
以增强对HyperWorks产品的信心。

HVVH的主要目标包括加快客户的软件采购
处理，加快从一个版本的HyperWorks迁移到另一个版本，并快速识别和解决
客户的软件问题。
这是一个跨预处理器、解算器和应用程序的集成端到端解决方案，
后处理器以及覆盖大多数HyperWorks产品的制造模拟。
只需单击一下，您就可以查看仪表板报告来决定质量
并根据任何验收标准接受产品。HVVH也可以快速
确定HyperWorks是否存在问题
产品套件。

GUI和批处理模式
HVVH可作为GUI和批处理模式的端到端解决方案
预处理和后处理、求解器和制造过程
的解决方案。
CAE工艺流程
遵循简单的CAE流程，您可以使用
模块，取决于产品不同阶段的要求
发展

doc_content:
Module Menus


The HVVH module contains the following menus:



File


The File menu contains the following options:
New
Creates a new task, depending on the tab you are currently on.
Load Session
Loads a session file created manually or with the HVVH interface. The
                            selections/settings in the active tab are set per the session file.
Save New Session
Each HVVH session can be saved as a session file, which can be retrieved
                            later. You can load this session file into HVVH or run HVVH in batch
                            mode.
Append Session
Appends the number of sessions and can be used for batch mode job
                            submissions.
Exit
Closes the program






Edit


From the Edit menu, select Config File or Text
                    Editor.

Config File
Use the Config File option to create or edit the configuration
                file.

Add HyperWorks version and path.
Invoke HVVH by invoking the batch file and then clicking Edit > Config File.
In the Version field, enter the HyperWorks
                            version.
In the Path field, click the file browser icon to select the
                            corresponding HyperWorks executable
                            path.
Click Add to populate the necessary clients in
                            the Version/Path Review table.

Tip:

Click Delete to delete all current
                                entries.
Click Save to save the configuration file.
                                You must restart HVVH for the new settings to take effect. For
                                    example:Version: 2021
Path:
                                            C:\altair\2021
For the solver: The actual solver path
                                    (based on the solver installation).




Add solver path.
From the Solver drop-down menu, select LsDyna or
                                Ansys.
In the Path field, click the file browser icon to select the solver file
                            path.
Click Add to populate the necessary clients in
                            the Version/Path Review table.


Define the solver executable version.
From the Solver drop-down menu, select
                                RadiossBlock or
                                OptiStruct.
In the Version field, enter the HyperWorks
                            version.
In the Path field, click the file browser icon to select the solver
                            executable directory.
Click Add to populate the necessary clients in
                            the Version/Path Review table.





Figure 1. 

Text Editor
Use the Text Editor option to set the location of the text editor
                (the editor that you want to use for viewing reports) on your PC. Click the file
                browser icon to set the location.

Figure 2. 





Exit


Click Exit to close the module.




Help


Click Help from the menu bar to display the HVVH online
                help.

doc_content:
Batch Mode
HVVH can be run in batch mode with a simple command line syntax using command line
        argument(s).


Batch Mode


HVVH Batch Mode
Launch.bat –b Session_path.session
Syntax Example
Launch.bat –b FE_Model_Basic_IO_all.session
Solver check run Batch Mode
Launch.bat –b Session_path.session -check run
Syntax Example
Launch.bat –b FE_Model_Basic_IO_all.session -check
                                run(this is applicable for FE Basic IO, Special case,
                                HC Basic IO)

Interlinking Tabs
Launch.bat –b LinkingOptions.txt
Interlinking Sessions
Launch.bat –b InterLinkingSessionfiles.txt



Session file example

MainTab : {FE Model}
SubTab : {Basic IO}
Number : 1
Begin : 1
    {Solver Type} : {OptiStruct}
     {HW Version} : {2021}
     {Model Checker} : 1
     {Input Files} : { Composite_Wing_cr1.fem}
     {Ouput Directory} : {C:/TEMP2}
End : 1

OPTIONS:
 {CAD} : {0}
 {FE} : {0}
 {CAD-FE} : {0}
 {FE-SOL-RESULT} : {0}
 {CAD-FE-SOL-RESULT} : {1}
Paths:

 {SOL-RESULT} : LinkingSolutionTabs.txt

Sessions:

doc_content:
Perform a Solver Check Run


Click the Design tab then the Check
                        Run tab.



Figure 1. 



From the File type drop-down menu, select Inspire.


Select the HyperWorks version number from the
                    list.


Click the file open icon  and select an input
                    file.


Click the file open icon  and select an output
                    directory to store your results file.


Select an OUT file comparison option.


Option
Description

Check Run
Input file (solver deck) is solved for 0 ms and displays the Run
                            status.


Out Ref. Compare
Input file (solver deck) is solved for 0 ms and displays the run
                            status. The .out file generated after the solver
                            check run is compared with the Reference .out
                            file


OUT Compare
The Input.out file is compared with the
                            reference .out file.


OUT File Comparison
The Input file (solver deck) is solved for 0 ms in the Current and
                            Reference solver versions. The generated .out files
                            are compared.





Specify a Reference OUT file if needed.


Click Check Run to output your solution.


Under Result file, click Status to view the status of
                    the Inspire model check run.



Tip:

The message log file displays
                                    the current status of processes in progress. Click
                                        Status/Diff to display the respective
                                    report. The message log file is a text file and is saved to your
                                    output directory.
Click Html
                                        Report to generate an HTML report of your
                                    session information for any number of files run through the
                                    process.

doc_content:
Compare Solver Version Results


Click the Design tab then the Solver version
                        result comparison tab.



Figure 1. 



From the Solver Type drop-down menu, select the result type to be
                    compared.
Option: Inspire


Select a Tolerance method then input the value used to set the tolerance for
                    the difference in values between the reference and current version result files
                    during comparison.


Option
Description

Default
1e-6 for Scalar, Tensor, and Vector, if not individually
                            chosen.


Scalar
Enter values if different for the scalar result type.


Vector
Enter values if different for the vector result type.


Tensor
Enter values if different for the tensor result type.


User Defined
Click Tolerance and set the individual
                            tolerance value for all data types.





Click Apply to set new values.


Select a result type from the Result drop-down menu.
HVVH dynamically loads the selected result file type under Load Result on Run
                    Solver.


Choose between a PowerPoint or
                        HTML report of the result value comparison.


Pass
This returns a detailed report containing one slide per data type
                                across load cases.
Fail
In case of a failure, one slide per load case for each datatype is
                                published so that it is easy to identify the load case that contains
                                a difference in values.




Select the current and reference solver
                    version.


Select the HyperView/Inspire model and results file for the current and
                    reference version.

Tip: Clicking Run Solver is required if the
                        result files are not available, and the solver needs to be run to generate
                        result files (for only one or both versions).The Inspire(OptiStruct)
                            solvers invoked in batch mode and the model selected through Load Model
                            are run, and the result file path is populated in the Load Result
                            field.




Select an output directory.


Click Run Solver if the Run solver check box is
                    activated.


Click Apply.


Click HyperView to launch HyperView interactive.
Use the set of commands below for result
                    comparison:::Displaycontour – Applies the contour to the Reference result.
::Applytolerance – Applies the tolerance.
::Diffcontour – Compares the Current and Reference results for the selected datatype.



Select any combination of subcases, simulations, and result types from the
                    populated areas.
Click All to select all items listed.


Click Apply to generate data to compare the results of
                    the chosen combination.
The Compare result section displays the current file and the
                    corresponding Reference file. Click Report to display the
                    diff report detailing the differences between files.



Tip:

The message log file displays
                                    the current status of processes in progress. Click
                                        Status/Diff to display the respective
                                    report. The message log file is a text file and is saved to your
                                    output directory.
Click Html
                                        Report to generate an HTML report of your
                                    session information for any number of files run through the
                                    process.

doc_title: Pre-processing for CAD Modeling and Meshing
doc_content:
Pre-processing for CAD Modeling and Meshing
Use the CAD and FE Model tabs to verify and validate CAD modeling and
        meshing.

Modeling and meshing are crucial steps in the CAE process. Verification and
                validation of data at these stages are important.
CAD models contain raw CAD data. When this raw data is read into the pre-processor,
                there is a chance that there could be a change in quality and data loss due to
                geometry clean up, for example. Identifying these parameters and taking corrective
                action would help the downstream process. Capturing such information as users
                switching between pre-processor versions is important to gain confidence in the
                processed data with later HyperWorks versions. Hence,
                advanced methodology with core API's have been used to extract such information and
                compare imported and exported CAD data with a CAD-CAD comparison.
As a next logical step, the CAD model is meshed in batch mode and the quality of the
                meshed elements (along with any loss in geometry) are identified. This part helps
                you create a finite element (FE) mesh in batch mode from a CAD model and perform an
                advanced comparison of geometry and the associated mesh (CAD-FE). This helps you
                verify and validate the CAD-meshed FE data - even across different versions of
                    HyperWorks - with suitable options.
translated_doc_content:
CAD建模和网格划分的预处理
使用“CAD”和“FE模型”选项卡验证和验证CAD建模和
啮合。

建模和网格划分是CAE过程中的关键步骤。验证和
这些阶段的数据验证非常重要。
CAD模型包含原始CAD数据。当该原始数据被读取到预处理器中时，
有可能由于以下原因而导致质量变化和数据丢失
例如，几何体清理。识别这些参数并采取纠正措施
行动将有助于下游进程。捕获用户等信息
在预处理器版本之间切换对于获得对
使用更高版本的HyperWorks处理数据。因此
已使用具有核心API的先进方法来提取此类信息，并且
将导入和导出的CAD数据与CAD-CAD比较进行比较。
作为下一个逻辑步骤，CAD模型以批处理模式进行网格划分
识别网格元素（以及几何结构中的任何损失）。这部分有助于
从CAD模型以批处理模式创建有限元（FE）网格，然后执行
几何图形和相关网格的高级比较（CAD-FE）。这对你有帮助
验证和验证CAD网格有限元数据-甚至在不同版本的
HyperWorks-提供合适的选项。

doc_content:
Compare CAD Input and Output
The native CAD model is imported into HyperMesh and
        exported using CAD readers in HyperMesh that are run in the
        background. The exported model is re-imported and overlaid. With superposed models using
        advanced CAD-CAD comparison, any loss of geometric data is identified, along with any entity
        changes. A reference report is also created.

Click the CAD tab then the CAD IO
                    tab.



Figure 1. 



Select a CAD input file from the first drop-down menu.
Supported file types include:
ACIS
CATIA
CATIA COMPOSE LINK
FiberSim
DXF
HDF5
IGES
JT
Parasolid
PDGS
ProE
SolidWorks
STEP
Tribon
UG
VDAFS
HM




Select an output file type from the second drop-down menu.
Supported file types include:
IGES
FiberSim
JT
Parasolid
CATIA COMPOSE LINK
STEP
HM




Select the HyperWorks version number from the third
                    drop-down menu.


Enter a Tolerance value for use in the comparison.

Tip: Click Native Reader to enable a native
                        reader. Original CAD software and licenses must be used. Only available for
                        the UG format.This method of import, along with feature-based meshing
                            technology, provides a robust way to create high-quality CAE solid
                            tetrahedral mesh models without a lot of geometry cleanup.




Input files.

Tip:

Click  to
                                search for and load additional input files. Select the top level
                                folder to load all files of selected file type.
Click in the cell for each file type to
                                activate it. Once the cell is active, click  to
                                display the file browser and load only selected files. You can also
                                add multiple files.
Click  to
                                delete a row from the table.





Select an output directory.


Click Import/Export to input your source file and output
                    your result information.
The time and status at import and export for each model file is
                    displayed in the Import Export table. Click Report to see
                    the CAD-CAD comparison report, which is generated for exported and re-imported
                    CAD files.



Tip:

The message log file displays
                                    the current status of processes in progress. Click
                                        Status/Diff to display the respective
                                    report. The message log file is a text file and is saved to your
                                    output directory.
Click Html
                                        Report to generate an HTML report of your
                                    session information for any number of files run through the
                                    process.
