doc_content:
HVVH-8000: Manufacturing Solution Tab - HyperForm


In this tutorial, you will setup a model in HyperForm and
                identify problems during the interactive operation.


Figure 1. 









FE Model Setup





From the Manufacturing Solution tab, select the HyperForm > FE Model > Model Setup tab.


See the topic FE Model Tab > Model Setup for more information on
                    model setup.





Basic Import and Export


Identify any loss of data during import and export HyperForm operations.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the  > HyperForm > FE Model > Basic IO tab.



Figure 2. 



From the Solver type list, select
                    Incremental_Radioss.


From the HW Version list, select 2017.


Under the Input decks section, click the file browser icon, , or the
                    add file icon, , to open the DAD_radios_0000
                    file, located in
                        ..\tutorials\hvvh\Manufacturing-solution\HF\Tut_01_AutoProcess_DAD\.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Import/Export.

Step 1 displays the import and export details and status (pass or fail) of
                        the reference model file (selected above).
The last column displays information on the ASCII differences between the
                        imported file and the HyperMesh exported file.
                        Pass (no differences) or Fail is displayed.
The original model and the HyperForm exported
                        models are run with the Radioss solver. The OUT
                        file blocks are compared as shown in the status. 
In the Messages window, the run details and the log file
                        location are displayed.


Figure 3. 



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report.



Figure 4. 






Compare HyperForm Versions


Compare analysis decks exported in different versions of HyperForm.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the > HyperForm > FE Model > Compare HF Versions tab.



Figure 5. 



From the File Type list, select
                    Incremental_Radioss.


From the Current Version list, select 2021.


From the Reference Version list, select 14.130.


Under the Input File section, click the file browser icon, , or the
                    add file icon, ,  to open the
                        DAD_radioss_0000.rad file, located in
                        ..\tutorials\hvvh\Manufacturing-solution\HF\Tut_01_AutoProcess_DAD\.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Import/Export.

The first table displays the import and export details and status (pass or
                        fail) of the model file (selected above) in the current version.
The second table details the import and export time and status (pass or fail)
                        of the model file (selected above) in the reference version.
The last column displays information on the ASCII differences between the
                        exported files in the current and reference versions of HyperMesh. Pass (no differences) or fail is
                        displayed.
In the Messages window, the run details are displayed
                        along with the log file location.



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report.



Figure 6. 






Solver Check Run for HyperXtrude

Perform a check run on a solver deck (Incremental_Radioss or Radioss_one_step) and
            compare OUT files of a solver-written result file after the check run.Three options
                are available for the solver check run:
Two OUT files generated from the solver run can be compared.
The current solver run OUT file can be compared with the reference OUT
                        file.
Two OUT files generated from the same solver deck using two different solver
                        versions can be compared.





From the Manufacturing Solutions tab, select the   > HyperForm > Solutions > Check run tab.


See Perform a Solver Check Run for more
                    information on options in the Check run tab.





Compare Results from Different Solver Versions


Perform solver version result comparison for HyperForm
                solver results for any given model.
If the result files are not available, the solver run can be performed in the
                background and the results generated are used in the result comparison. Results from
                Radioss_onestep or Radioss_incremental can be compared.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the  > HyperXtrude/HyperModel > Solutions > Solver version results comparison tab.


See Compare Solver Version Results for more information on options in
                    the Solver version results comparison tab.





Compare HyperForm Solver Results Across HyperView Versions


Compare solver results from two HyperView versions (for
                    Radioss and H3D).


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the   > HyperForm > Results > Solver result comparison HV versions tab.


See Compare HV Solver Version Results for more information on options in
                    the Solver results comparison HV versions tab.





Compare HyperForm Solver Results Across HyperGraph Versions


Compare solver results from two HyperGraph versions.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the   > HyperForm > Results > Solver result comparison HG versions tab.


See Compare HG Version Results for more information on options in the
                    Solver results comparison HG versions tab.

模型设置。





基本进出口


识别导入和导出HyperForm操作期间的任何数据丢失。


从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择>HyperForm>FE Model>Basic IO选项卡。



图2:



从“解算器类型”列表中，选择
增量无线电（_R）。


从硬件版本列表中，选择2017。


在“Input decks”部分下，单击文件浏览器图标，或
添加文件图标，打开DAD_radios_0000
文件，位于
..\tutorials\hvvh\制造解决方案\HF\Tut_01_AutoProcess_DAD\。


在“输出目录”字段中，单击以
选择一个输出目录。


单击“导入/导出”。

步骤1显示的导入和导出详细信息以及状态（通过或失败）
参考模型文件（如上所选）。
最后一列显示了
导入的文件和HyperMesh导出的文件。
显示通过（无差异）或失败。
导出的原始模型和HyperForm
模型使用“无辐射”解算器运行。OUT
比较文件块，如状态中所示。
在“消息”窗口中，运行详细信息和日志文件
显示位置。


图3。



单击HTML报告打开HTML报告。



图4。






比较HyperForm版本


比较在不同版本的HyperForm中导出的分析数据组。


从“制造解决方案”选项卡中，选择>HyperForm>FE Model>Compare HF Versions选项卡。



图5。



从“文件类型”列表中，选择
增量无线电（_R）。


从当前版本列表中，选择2021。


从“参考版本”列表中，选择14.130。


在“输入文件”部分下，单击文件浏览器图标，或
添加文件图标，打开
DAD_radioss_0000.rad文件，位于
..\tutorials\hvvh\制造解决方案\HF\Tut_01_AutoProcess_DAD\。


在“输出目录”字段中，单击以
选择一个输出目录。


单击“导入/导出”。

第一个表显示导入和导出的详细信息和状态（通过或
失败）。
下表详细说明了导入和导出的时间和状态（通过或失败）
参考版本中模型文件（如上所选）的。
最后一列显示了
HyperMesh的当前版本和参考版本中导出的文件。通过（无差异）或失败是
显示。
在“消息”窗口中，将显示运行详细信息
以及日志文件位置。



单击HTML报告打开HTML报告。



图6。






HyperXtrude的解算器检查运行

在解算器甲板上执行检查运行（Incremental_Radioss或Radioss_one_step），然后
在检查运行之后比较解算器写入的结果文件的OUT文件。三个选项
可用于解算器检查运行：
可以比较从解算器运行生成的两个OUT文件。
当前解算器运行OUT文件可以与参考OUT进行比较
文件
使用两个不同的解算器从同一解算器组生成的两个OUT文件
可以比较版本。





从“制造解决方案”选项卡中，选择>HyperForm>解决方案>检查运行选项卡。


有关详细信息，请参见执行解算器检查运行
有关“检查运行”选项卡中选项的信息。





比较不同解算器版本的结果


对HyperForm执行解算器版本结果比较
任何给定模型的求解器结果。
如果结果文件不可用，则可以在中执行解算器运行
在结果比较中使用背景和生成的结果。结果来自
可以比较Radioss_onestep或Radioss_incremental。


从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择>HyperXtrude/HyperModel>解决方案>解算器版本结果比较选项卡。


有关中选项的详细信息，请参见比较解算器版本结果
“解算器版本结果比较”选项卡。





比较HyperView版本之间的HyperForm解算器结果


比较两个HyperView版本的解算器结果（用于
Radioss和H3D）。


从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择>HyperForm>结果>解算器结果比较HV版本选项卡。


有关中选项的更多信息，请参见比较HV解算器版本结果
“解算器结果比较HV版本”选项卡。





比较HyperGraph版本之间的HyperForm解算器结果


比较两个HyperGraph版本的解算器结果。


从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择>HyperForm>结果>解算器结果比较HG版本选项卡。


有关中选项的更多信息，请参阅比较HG版本结果
解算器结果比较HG版本选项卡。

HVVH-9000: Manufacturing Solution Tab - HyperXtrude


In this tutorial, you will setup a model in HyperXtrude
                and identify problems during the HyperXtrude interactive
                operation.






FE Model Setup



From the Manufacturing Solution tab, select the HyperXtrude/HyperModel > FE Model > Model Setup tab.


See the FE Model Tab > Model Setup topic for more
                    information on model setup.





Basic Import and Export


Identify any loss of data during HyperXtrude import and
                export operations.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the HyperXtrude/HyperModel > FE Model > Basic IO tab.



Figure 1. 



From the Solver Type list, select Metal_Extrusion.


From the HW Version list, select 2021.


Under Input decks section, click the file browser icon, , or the
                    add file icon, , to open the file
                        3D_Die_Benchmark_2009.grf,  located in
                        ..\tutorials\hvvh\Manufacturing-solution\HX\Tutorial-001-ME-SolidProfile.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Import/Export.

Step 1 displays the import and export details and status (pass or fail) of
                        the reference model file (selected above).
The last column displays information on the ASCII differences between the
                        imported file and the HyperMesh exported file.
                        Pass (no differences) or Fail is displayed.
The original model and the HyperXtrude exported
                        models are run with the Radioss solver and the
                        OUT file blocks are compared as shown in the status. 
In the Messages window, the run details are displayed
                        along with the log file location.


Figure 2. 



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report.



Figure 3. 






Compare HyperXtrude Versions


Compare the analysis decks exported in different versions of HyperXtrude.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the  > HyperXtrude/HyperModel > FE Model > Compare HX Versions tab.



Figure 4. 



From the Solver type list, select Metal_Extrusion.


From the Current Version list, select 2021.


From the Reference Version list, select
                    14.0.0.130.


Under the Input file section, click the file browser icon, , or the
                    add file icon, , to open the file
                        3D_Die_Benchmark_2009.grf, located in
                        ..\tutorials\hvvh\Manufacturing-solution\HX\Tutorial-001-ME-SolidProfil3.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Import/Export.

The first table displays the import and export details and status (pass or
                        fail) of the model file (selected above) in the current version.
The second table displays the import and export time and status (pass or
                        fail) of the model file (selected above) in the reference version.
The last column displays information on the ASCII differences between the
                        exported files in the current and reference versions of HyperMesh. Pass (no differences) or fail is
                        displayed.
In the Messages window, the run details are displayed
                        along with the log file location.



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report.



Figure 5. 


Figure 6. 






Solver Check Run for HyperXtrude

In this step, you will perform a check run on a solver
            deck (HyperXtrude and tool deflection), and compare OUT
            files from a solver-written result file after the check run. Three options are
                available for the solver check run:

Two OUT files generated from the solver run can be compared.
The current solver run OUT file can be compared with the reference OUT
                    file.
Two OUT files generated from the same solver deck using two different solver
                    versions can be compared.



From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the  > HyperXtrude/HyperModel > Solutions > Check run tab.


See the topic Perform a Solver Check Run for more information on the tab's
                    options.





Compare Results from Different Solver Versions

In this step, you will perform solver version result
            comparison for any given model's solver results. If the result files are not available,
            the solver run can be performed in the background and the results generated are used in
            the result comparison.


From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the  > HyperXtrude/HyperModel > Solutions > Solver version results comparison tab.


See the Compare Solver Version Results topic for more information on the
                    options available.





Compare HyperXtrude Solver Results Across HyperView Versions





From the Manufacturing solution tab, select the HyperXtrude/HyperModel > Result > Solver result comparison HV versions tab.


See the Compare HV Solver Version Results topic for more
                    information on the options available.

求解器运行可以在后台执行，生成的结果用于
结果比较。


从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择>HyperXtrude/HyperModel>解决方案>解算器版本结果比较选项卡。


有关的详细信息，请参阅“比较解算器版本结果”主题
选项可用。





比较HyperView版本之间的HyperXtrude解算器结果





从制造解决方案选项卡中，选择HyperXtrude/Hyper>结果>解算器结果比较HV版本选项卡。


有关详细信息，请参阅比较HV解算器版本结果主题
有关可用选项的信息。

doc_content:
HVVH-9500: AutoCompare









HyperMesh Operations Use Case 1





From the AutoCompare tab, select the HM operations
                    tab.


From the Solver Type list, select HM.


Select the Reference compare only check box and deselect
                        Reference files.
The Current Version drop-down menu is disabled.


From the Reference Version list, select 2021.


Click the file browser icon, , or the add file icon, , to select reference scripts, reference models, and
                    reference files, located in
                    ..\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Apply.

Scripts are executed on reference models in the reference version and a
                        generated OUT file is compared with the reference files.
The reference file can be any solver deck or ASCII file.
The report status is displayed under User Report.



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report, which contains
                    details of the script executed in HyperMesh.





HyperMesh Operations Use Case 2





From the AutoCompare tab, select the HM operations
                    tab.


From the Solver Type list, select HM.


Deselect the Reference compare only check box and the
                        Reference files check box.


From the Current Version list, select 2021


From the Reference Version list, select 2017.0.


Click the file browser icon, , or the add file icon, , to select reference scripts and reference models,
                    located in ..\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Apply.

Scripts are executed on reference models in the current version and reference
                        version. An OUT file generated in both versions is compared.
The report status is displayed under User Report.



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report, which contains
                    details of the script executed in HyperMesh.





HyperMesh Operations Use Case 3





From the AutoCompare tab, select the HM operations
                    tab.


From the Solver Type list, select HM.


Select the Reference files check box and deselect the
                        Reference compare only check box.


From the Current Version list, select 2021


From the Reference Version list, select 2017.0.


Click the file browser icon, , or the add file icon, , to select reference scripts, reference models, and
                    reference files, located in
                    ..\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare.


In the Output directory field, click  to
                    select an output directory.


Click Apply.

Use case 3 is a combination of use case 1 and use case 2. It contains two
                            steps:
Step 1: Scripts are executed on reference models in the reference
                                version and a generated OUT file is compared with the reference
                                files.
Step 2: Scripts are executed on reference models in the current
                                version and a generated OUT file is compared with the OUT file
                                generated in Step 1.


Reference files can be any solver deck or ASCII file.
The report status is displayed under User Report.



Click HTML Report to open an HTML report, which contains
                    details of the script executed in HyperMesh.

HVVH-9500：自动比较









HyperMesh操作用例1





从“自动比较”选项卡中，选择HM操作
选项卡。


从“解算器类型”列表中，选择HM。


选中“仅参考比较”复选框并取消选择
参考文件。
当前版本下拉菜单被禁用。


从“参考版本”列表中，选择“2021”。


单击文件浏览器图标或添加文件图标，以选择参照脚本、参照模型和
参考文件，位于
..\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare。


在“输出目录”字段中，单击以
选择一个输出目录。


单击“应用”。

脚本在参考版本中的参考模型上执行
将生成的OUT文件与参考文件进行比较。
参考文件可以是任何解算器组或ASCII文件。
报告状态显示在“用户报告”下。



单击“HTML报告”打开HTML报告，其中包含
HyperMesh中执行的脚本的详细信息。





HyperMesh操作用例2





从“自动比较”选项卡中，选择HM操作
选项卡。


从“解算器类型”列表中，选择HM。


取消选中“仅参考比较”复选框，然后
“引用文件”复选框。


从当前版本列表中，选择2021


从“参考版本”列表中，选择2017.0。


单击文件浏览器图标或添加文件图标，以选择参考脚本和参考模型，
位于。。\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare。


在“输出目录”字段中，单击以
选择一个输出目录。


单击“应用”。

脚本在当前版本和引用中的引用模型上执行
版本比较两个版本中生成的OUT文件。
报告状态显示在“用户报告”下。



单击“HTML报告”打开HTML报告，其中包含
HyperMesh中执行的脚本的详细信息。





HyperMesh操作用例3





从“自动比较”选项卡中，选择HM操作
选项卡。


从“解算器类型”列表中，选择HM。


选中“引用文件”复选框，然后取消选择
“仅引用比较”复选框。


从当前版本列表中，选择2021


从“参考版本”列表中，选择2017.0。


单击文件浏览器图标或添加文件图标，以选择参照脚本、参照模型和
参考文件，位于
..\tutorials\hvvh\AutoCompare。


在“输出目录”字段中，单击以
选择一个输出目录。


单击“应用”。

用例3是用例1和用例2的组合。它包含两个
步骤：
步骤1：在引用中的引用模型上执行脚本
版本，并将生成的OUT文件与参考文件进行比较
文件夹。
步骤2：在当前的参考模型上执行脚本
版本，并将生成的OUT文件与OUT文件进行比较
在步骤1中生成。


参考文件可以是任何解算器组或ASCII文件。
报告状态显示在“用户报告”下。



单击“HTML报告”打开HTML报告，其中包含
HyperMesh中执行的脚本的详细信息。

doc_content:
Uninstall HyperWorks
Uninstall HyperWorks is a tool to launch the HyperWorks uninstallation program. This program contains two options
        that allow you to either remove the originally installed files, or remove all the files that
        resides in the installation directory. 

Windows 7


From the Start menu, select All Programs. 


Select Altair  <version>.


Select Tools.


Select Uninstall_HyperWorksMasterInstaller 2021.


Follow the prompts to complete the uninstall.




Windows 10


From the Start menu, select All apps.


Select Altair  <version>


Select Uninstall_HyperWorksMasterInstaller
                                <version>.


Follow the prompts to complete the uninstall.



Note:
If the shortcut for the master uninstaller is not shown, use Windows
                            Programs and Features to uninstall the software.
translated_doc_content:
卸载HyperWorks
卸载HyperWorks是启动HyperWorks卸载程序的工具。此程序包含两个选项
允许您删除最初安装的文件，或删除所有
位于安装目录中。

Windows 7


从“开始”菜单中，选择“所有程序”。


选择Altair＜版本＞。


选择“工具”。


选择Uninstall_HyperWorksMasterInstaller 2021。


按照提示完成卸载。




Windows 10


从“开始”菜单中，选择“所有应用程序”。


选择Altair＜版本＞


选择Uninstall_HyperWorksMasterInstaller
版本


按照提示完成卸载。



笔记
如果没有显示主卸载程序的快捷方式，请使用Windows
用于卸载软件的程序和功能。
